[03]^b^148^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Garukehī^eb^ti garukātabbehi. ^b^Ekatoupasampannāyā^eb^ti upayogatthe bhummavacanaṃ. ‘‘Ovadatī’’ti vā imassa ‘‘vadatī’’ti atthe sati sampadānavacanampi yujjati. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampannā nāma parivattaliṅgā vā pañcasatasākiyāniyo vā.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āsanaṃ paññapetvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘sace bhūmi manāpā hoti, āsanaṃ apaññāpetumpi vaṭṭatī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Mātugāma^eb^ggahaṇena bhikkhunīpi saṅgahitāti āha ^b^‘‘dhammadesanāpattimocanattha’’^eb^nti. Sammatassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ pāṭipade ovādatthāya sabbāhi bhikkhunīhi āgantabbato ‘‘samaggāttha bhaginiyo’’ti iminā sabbāsaṃ āgamanaṃ pucchatīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbā āgatātthā’’^eb^ti. Gilānāsu anāgatāsupi gilānānaṃ anāgamanassa anuññātattā āgantuṃ samatthāhi ca sabbāhi āgatattā ‘‘samaggāmhayyā’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Antogāme vā^eb^tiādīsu yattha pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandituṃ na sakkā hoti, tattha ṭhitāya eva kāyaṃ purato nāmetvā ‘‘vandāmi ayyā’’ti añjaliṃ paggayha gantumpi vaṭṭati. ^b^Antaraghara^eb^nti katthaci nagaradvārassa bahiindakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo vuccati, katthaci gharummārato paṭṭhāya antogehaṃ. Idha pana ‘‘antogāme vā’’ti visuṃ vuttattā ‘‘antaraghare vā’’ti antogehaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Yattha katthacī^eb^ti antogāmādīsu yattha katthaci.

[03]^b^Vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ‘‘vasatha ayye, mayaṃ bhikkhū ānessāmā’’ti vuttavacanaṃ saddahantīhi vasituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Na nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā^eb^ti manussehi nimantitā hutvā gantukāmā na hontīti attho, tattheva vassaṃ upagantukāmā hontīti adhippāyo. ^b^Yato^eb^ti bhikkhunupassayato. ^b^Yācitvā^eb^ti ‘‘tumhehi ānītaovādeneva mayampi vasissāmā’’ti yācitvā. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ bhikkhunupassaye. ^b^Āgatānaṃ santike ovādena vasitabba^eb^nti pacchimikāya vassaṃ vasitabbaṃ. ^b^Abhikkhukāvāse vasantiyā āpattī^eb^ti codanāmukhena sāmaññato āpattippasaṅgaṃ vadati, na pana tassā ^a^M3.0044^ea^ āpatti. ^b^Vassacchedaṃ katvā gacchantiyāpi āpattī^eb^ti vassānupagamamūlaṃ āpattiṃ vadati. Itarāya āpattiyā anāpattikāraṇasabbhāvato ^b^‘‘sā rakkhitabbā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, sā vassānupagamamūlā āpatti rakkhitabbāti attho, abhikkhukepi āvāse īdisāsu āpadāsu vassaṃ upagantabbanti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āpadāsu hi…pe… anāpatti vuttā’’^eb^ti. Itarāya ^a^V3.0040^ea^ pana āpattiyā anāpatti, kāraṇe asati pacchimikāyapi vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ. Santesu hi bhikkhūsu vassaṃ anupagacchantiyā āpatti. ^b^Tattha gantvā pavāretabba^eb^nti ettha apavārentīnaṃ āpattisambhavato. Sace dūrepi bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sakkā ca hoti navamiyaṃ gantvā pavāretuṃ, tattha gantvā pavāretabbaṃ. Sace pana navamiyaṃ nikkhamitvā sampāpuṇituṃ na sakkā hoti, agacchantīnaṃ anāpatti.

[03]Uposathassa pucchanaṃ uposathapucchā, sāyeva ^b^ka^eb^-ppaccayaṃ rassattañca katvā ^b^uposathapucchaka^eb^nti vuttāti āha ^b^‘‘uposathapucchana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uposatho pucchitabbo^eb^ti ‘‘kadā, ayya, uposatho’’ti pucchitabbo. Bhikkhunāpi ‘‘sve, bhagini, uposatho’’ti vattabbaṃ. Bhikkhū kadāci kenaci kāraṇena pannarasikaṃ vā cātuddasīuposathaṃ, cātuddasikaṃ vā pannarasīuposathaṃ karonti, yasmiñca divase bhikkhūhi uposatho kato, tasmiṃyeva bhikkhunīhipi uposatho kātabboti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva gantvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pucchitena bhikkhunā sace cātuddasiyaṃ uposathaṃ karonti, ‘‘cātuddasiko bhaginī’’ti vattabbaṃ. Sace pana pannarasiyaṃ karonti, ‘‘pannarasiko bhaginī’’ti ācikkhitabbaṃ. ^b^Ovādatthāyā^eb^ti ovādayācanatthāya. ^b^Pāṭipadadivasato pana paṭṭhāya dhammasavanatthāya gantabba^eb^nti pāṭipadadivase ovādaggahaṇatthāya dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya antarantarā dhammasavanatthāya gantabbaṃ. Ovādaggahaṇampi hi ‘‘dhammasavanamevā’’ti abhedena vuttaṃ. ^b^Nirantaraṃ vihāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsū^eb^ti yebhuyyena upasaṅkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttañheta^eb^ntiādinā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmāti sabbāsaṃyeva bhikkhunīnaṃ upasaṅkamanadīpanatthaṃ pāḷi nidassitā. ^b^Ovādaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti ovādaṃ yācituṃ gacchati. ^b^Dve tisso^eb^ti dvīhi tīhi. Karaṇatthe cetaṃ paccattavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Pāsādikenā^eb^ti pasādajanakena niddosena kāyakammādinā. ^b^Sampādetū^eb^ti tividhaṃ sikkhaṃ sampādetu. Sace pātimokkhuddesakaṃyeva disvā ^a^M3.0045^ea^ tāhi bhikkhunīhi ovādo yācito bhaveyya, tena kiṃ kātabbanti? Uposathagge sannipatite bhikkhusaṅghe pubbakiccavasena ‘‘atthi kāci bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ yācamānā’’ti pucchiyamāne ‘‘evaṃ vadehī’’ti ovādapaṭiggāhakena vattabbavacanaṃ aññena bhikkhunā kathāpetvā pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbavacanaṃ attanā vatvā puna sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ, aññena vā bhikkhunā tasmiṃ divase pātimokkhaṃ uddisāpetabbaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘tāhī’’ti etaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekā bhikkhunī vā^eb^ti idaṃ bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi ekāya eva bhikkhuniyā sāsanapaṭiggahaṇaṃ ^a^V3.0041^ea^ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana dutiyikāya abhāvaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehī^eb^ti antarāmagge vā tasmiṃyeva vā gāme bahūhi bhikkhunupassayehi. ‘‘Bhikkhunisaṅgho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunī cā’’ti iminā nānāupassayehi sāsanaṃ gahetvā āgatabhikkhuniyā vattabbavacanaṃ dasseti. Idañca ekena pakārena mukhamattanidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana bhikkhunupassaye bhikkhunīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā tadanurūpena nayena vattabbaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhusaṅghassa ayyānaṃ ayyassā^eb^ti idaṃ saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhuddesakenapī^eb^ti idaṃ saṅghuposathavaseneva dassitaṃ. Yattha pana tiṇṇaṃ dvinnaṃ vā vasanaṭṭhāne pātimokkhuddeso natthi, tatthāpi ñattiṭhapanakena itarena vā bhikkhunā imināva nayena vattabbaṃ. Ekapuggalenapi uposathadivase ovādayācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pāṭipade āgatānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ ‘‘natthi kocī’’tiādi vattabbameva. Sace sayameva, ‘‘sammato aha’’nti vattabbaṃ. Imaṃ vidhiṃ ajānanto idha bāloti adhippeto.

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassā^eb^tiādīsu vijjamānesupi vaggādibhāvanimittesu dukkaṭesu adhammakammamūlakaṃ pācittiyameva pāḷiyaṃ sabbattha vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘adhammakamme dvinnaṃ navakānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa pācittiyānī’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Asammatatā, bhikkhuniyā paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, ovādavasena aṭṭhagarudhammabhaṇananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Ovādasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^a^M3.0046^ea^^b^kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sātaccakiriyāyā^eb^ti pubbabhāgappaṭipattivasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Munātī^eb^ti jānāti. ^b^Tena ñāṇenā^eb^ti tena arahattaphalapaññāsaṅkhātena ñāṇena. ^b^Pathesū^eb^ti upāyamaggesu. Arahato pariniṭṭhitasikkhattā āha ^b^‘‘idañca…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. Atha vā ‘‘appamajjato sikkhato’’ti imesaṃ padānaṃ hetuatthatā daṭṭhabbā, tasmā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti attho. ^b^Sokā^eb^ti cittasantāpā. Ettha ca ^b^adhicetaso^eb^ti iminā adhicittasikkhā, ^b^appamajjato^eb^ti iminā adhisīlasikkhā, ^b^munino monapathesu sikkhato^eb^ti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā, ^b^munino^eb^ti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā, ^b^monapathesu sikkhato^eb^ti etena ^a^V3.0042^ea^ tāsaṃ lokuttarasikkhānaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadā, ^b^sokā na bhavantī^eb^tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃsā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kokanuda^eb^nti padumavisesanaṃ yathā ‘‘kokāsaya’’nti, taṃ kira bahupattaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ ativiya sugandhañca hoti. ‘‘Kokanudaṃ nāma setapaduma’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Pāto^eb^ti pageva. Ayañhettha attho – yathā kokanudasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pāto sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ phullaṃ vikasitaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ, evaṃ sarīragandhena guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṃ saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano tejasā tapantaṃ aṅgehi niccharaṇajutitāya aṅgīrasaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ passāti.

[03]^b^Abhabbo^eb^ti paṭipattisāramidaṃ sāsanaṃ, paṭipatti ca pariyattimūlikā, tvañca pariyattiṃ uggahetuṃ asamattho, tasmā abhabboti adhippāyo. ^b^Suddhaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍa^eb^nti iddhiyā abhisaṅkhataṃ parisuddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ. Tadā kira bhagavā ‘‘na sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto mama sāsane abhabbo nāma hoti, mā soci bhikkhū’’ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā iddhiyā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ abhinimminitvā ‘‘handa, bhikkhu, imaṃ parimajjanto ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti punappunaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karohī’’ti vatvā adāsi tattha pubbekatādhikārattā.

[03]So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato sede muccante parisuddhena sāṭakena nalāṭaṃ puñchi, sāṭako kiliṭṭho ahosi ^a^M3.0047^ea^. So ‘‘imaṃ sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo parisuddhasāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto, aniccā vata saṅkhārā’’ti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhati, tena kāraṇenassa rajoharaṇameva paccayo jāto. Rajaṃ haratīti ^b^rajoharaṇaṃ. Saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā^eb^ti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca upaṭṭhapento saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā. So hi yoniso ummajjanto ‘‘parisuddhaṃ vatthaṃ, natthettha doso, attabhāvassa panāyaṃ doso’’ti asubhasaññaṃ aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaapāṭiyā vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vipassanaṃ ārabhī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsī^eb^ti obhāsavissajjanapubbakabhāsitagāthā obhāsagāthā, taṃ abhāsīti attho.

[03]Ettha ca ‘‘adhicetasoti imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsī’’ti idheva vuttaṃ. ^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.386) pana ^a^V3.0043^ea^^b^dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.cūḷapanthakattheravatthu) ^b^theragāthāsaṃvaṇṇanāyañca^eb^ (theragā. aṭṭha. 2.566) –
[21]‘‘Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
[27]Rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
[26]Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā paṇḍitā;
[22]Viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
[22]‘‘Doso…pe… sāsane.
[21]‘‘Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati;
[27]Mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
[26]Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā paṇḍitā;
[22]Viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsaneti. –

[07]Imā tisso obhāsagāthā abhāsī’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Adhicetaso^eb^ti ca ayaṃ cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāti imissāyeva pāḷiyā āgataṃ. Theragāthāyaṃ pana cūḷapanthakattherassa udānagāthāsu ayaṃ anāruḷhā, ‘‘ekudāniyattherassa pana ayaṃ udānagāthā’’ti (theragā. aṭṭha. 1.ekudāniyattheragāthāvaṇṇanā) tattha vuttaṃ. Evaṃ santepi imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamāgatattā cūḷapanthakattherassapi ayaṃ ^a^M3.0048^ea^ udānagāthā obhāsagāthāvasena ca bhagavatā bhāsitāti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Arahattaṃ pāpuṇī^eb^ti abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. ^b^Abhabbo tva^eb^ntiādivacanato anukampāvasena saddhivihārikādiṃ saṅghikavihārā nikkaḍḍhāpentassa anāpatti viya dissati. Abhabbo hi thero sañcicca taṃ kātuṃ, nikkaḍḍhanasikkhāpade vā apaññatte therena evaṃ katanti gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ovadantassa pācittiya^eb^nti atthaṅgate sūriye garudhammehi vā aññena vā dhammeneva ovadantassa sammatassapi pācittiyaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Atthaṅgatasūriyatā, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, ovadananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Atthaṅgatasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^162^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyaṃ ^a^V3.0044^ea^ uttānatthameva. Upassayūpagamanaṃ, paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, samayābhāvo, garudhammehi ovadananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Bhikkhunupassayasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^164^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ‘‘upasampannaṃ…pe… bhikkhunovādaka’’nti imesaṃ ‘‘maṅkukattukāmo’’ti iminā sambandho. ‘‘Avaṇṇaṃ kattukāmo ayasaṃ kattukāmo’’ti imesaṃ pana vasena ‘‘upasampanna’’ntiādīsu ‘‘upasampannassā’’ti vibhattivipariṇāmo kātabboti imamatthaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘ujjhāpanake vuttanayenevattho veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Cīvarahetu ovadatī’’tiādinā bhaṇantassa ekekasmiṃ vacane niṭṭhite pācittiyaṃ veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Upasampannaṃ saṅghena asammata’’nti pāḷivacanato ‘‘sammatena vā saṅghena vā bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito’’ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato ca aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato sammatena vā vippavasitukāmena ‘‘yāvāhaṃ āgamissāmi, tāva ^a^M3.0049^ea^ te bhāro hotū’’ti yācitvā ṭhapito tassābhāvato saṅghena vā tatheva bhāraṃ katvā ṭhapito aṭṭhahi garudhammehi aññena vā dhammena ovadituṃ labhatīti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā ‘‘yo pana, bhikkhu, asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiya’’nti idaṃ pageva bhāraṃ katvā aṭṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anāpatti pakatiyā cīvarahetu…pe… ovadantaṃ bhaṇatī^eb^ti ettha āmisahetu ovadantaṃ ‘‘āmisahetu ovadatī’’ti saññāya evaṃ bhaṇantassa anāpatti, ‘‘na āmisahetu ovadatī’’ti saññino pana dukkaṭaṃ, na āmisahetu ovadantaṃ pana ‘‘āmisahetu ovadatī’’ti saññāya bhaṇantassapi anāpatti sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannatā, dhammena laddhasammutitā, anāmisantaratā, avaṇṇakāmatāya evaṃ bhaṇananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Āmisasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^175^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^V3.0045^ea^ sace sā bhikkhunī taṃ cīvaraṃ āditova pārupeyya, aññā bhikkhuniyo disvā ujjhāpeyyuṃ, tato mahājano passituṃ na labhatīti maññamāno ^b^‘‘yathāsaṃhaṭaṃ haritvā nikkhipitvā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nīharatī^eb^ti sakiṃ nīharati. Yepi tesaṃ nissitakāti sambandho. ^b^Kathinavatta^eb^nti ‘‘sabrahmacārīnaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti itikattabbatāvasena sūcikammakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dukkaṭa^eb^nti akappiyasamādānavasena dukkaṭaṃ. ^b^Vañcetvā^eb^ti ‘‘tava ñātikāyā’’ti avatvā ‘‘ekissā bhikkhuniyā’’ti ettakameva vatvā. ‘‘Ekissā bhikkhuniyā’’ti sutvā te aññātikasaññino bhaveyyunti āha ^b^‘‘akappiye niyojitattā’’^eb^ti ^a^M3.0050^ea^. ‘‘Idaṃ te mātu cīvara’’ntiādīni avatvāpi ‘‘idaṃ cīvaraṃ sibbehī’’ti suddhacittena sibbāpentassapi anāpatti.

[03]^b^179^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upāhanatthavikādi^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā na sakkā hoti, tampi saṅgaṇhāti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā santakatā, nivāsanapārupanūpagatā, vuttanayena sibbanaṃ vā sibbāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Cīvarasibbāpanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^181^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ‘‘pacchā gacchantīnaṃ corā acchindiṃsū’’ti ettha ‘‘pattacīvara’’nti pāṭhasesoti āha ^b^‘‘pacchā gacchantīnaṃ pattacīvara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tā bhikkhuniyo^eb^ti pacchā gacchantiyo bhikkhuniyo. ‘‘Pacchā gacchantīna’’nti ca vibhattivipariṇāmenettha sambandho veditabbo. Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘gacchāma bhagini, gacchāma ayyā’’ti bhikkhupubbakaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ vuttaṃ, ‘‘gacchāma ayya, gacchāma bhaginī’’ti bhikkhunīpubbakaṃ. ^b^Ekaddhānamagga^eb^nti ekaṃ addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ, ekato vā addhānamaggaṃ. ^b^Hiyyo^eb^ti suve. ^b^Pare^eb^ti tatiyadivase.

[03]^b^182-183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvidhā vuttappakāro^eb^ti pādagamanavasena pakkhagamanavasena vāti dvidhā vuttappabhedo ^a^V3.0046^ea^. Catunnaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^catukkaṃ,^eb^ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ sambandhaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^siṅghāṭakaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Gāmantare gāmantare’’ti ettha añño gāmo gāmantaranti āha ^b^‘‘nikkhamane anāpatti…pe… bhikkhuno pācittiya’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Saṃvidhāyā’’ti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā ^b^‘‘neva pāḷiyā sametī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘etthantare saṃvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukkaṭa’’nti vuttattā ^b^‘‘na sesaaṭṭhakathāya sametī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassā^eb^ti asati gāme addhayojanaṃ atikkamantassa. Yattha hi addhayojanabbhantare añño gāmo na hoti, taṃ idha agāmakaṃ araññanti adhippetaṃ, addhayojanabbhantare pana gāme sati gāmantaragaṇanāya eva āpatti.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Raṭṭhabhede^eb^ti raṭṭhavilope. ^b^Cakkasamāruḷhā^eb^ti iriyāpathacakkaṃ sakaṭacakkaṃ vā samāruḷhā. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Dvinnampi saṃvidahitvā maggappaṭipatti ^a^M3.0051^ea^, avisaṅketaṃ, samayābhāvo, anāpadā, gāmantarokkamanaṃ vā addhayojanātikkamo vāti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni. Ekatoupasampannādīhi saddhiṃ gacchantassa pana mātugāmasikkhāpadena āpatti.
[06]Saṃvidahanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^188^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^lokassādamittasanthavavasena kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvā^eb^ti ayaṃ viseso ‘‘evamime…pe… bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ nāvāya kīḷantī’’ti iminā ‘‘uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā’’ti iminā ca siddho.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nadiyā kuto gāmantaranti āha ^b^‘‘yassā nadiyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Tassā sagāmakatīrapassena…pe… addhayojanagaṇanāyā^eb^ti ekekapasseneva gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā tādisikāya nadiyā majjhena gacchantassa gāmantaragaṇanāya addhayojanagaṇanāya ca āpattī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Sabbaaṭṭhakathāsū^eb^tiādinā attanā vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti. ‘‘Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa nadiyaṃyeva pācittiyassa vuttattā vāpisamuddādīsu kīḷāpurekkhāratāya dukkaṭameva, na pācittiya’’nti vadanti. ‘‘Lokassādamittasanthavavasena kīḷāpurekkhārā saṃvidahitvā’’ti vacanato keci ‘‘imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ lokavajja’’nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kīḷāpurekkhāratāya hi abhiruhitvāpi gāmantarokkamane addhayojanātikkame vā kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgīpi hutvā āpattiṃ āpajjati ^a^V3.0047^ea^. Yadi hi so saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ vā sacchikareyya, niddaṃ vā okkameyya, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi karonto gaccheyya, kuto tassa akusalacittasamaṅgitā, yenidaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ akusalacittaṃ lokavajjanti vuccati, tasmā paṇṇattivajjaṃ ticittanti siddhaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Nāvābhiruhanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^194^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^M3.0052^ea^^b^paṭiyādita^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya sampāditaṃ. ^b^Ñātakā vā honti pavāritā vā^eb^ti ettha sacepi bhikkhuno aññātakā appavāritā ca siyuṃ, bhikkhuniyā ñātakā pavāritā ce, vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāpabhikkhūnaṃ pakkhupacchedāya idaṃ paññattaṃ, tasmā pañcabhojaneyeva āpatti vuttā. ^b^Pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī^eb^ti idaṃ pana iminā sikkhāpadena anāpattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Viññattiyā uppannaṃ paribhuñjantassa hi aññattha vuttanayena dukkaṭaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Bhikkhuniparipācitabhāvo, jānanaṃ, gihisamārambhābhāvo, odanādīnaṃ aññataratā, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Paripācitasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^198^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenā^eb^ti appaṭicchanne mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi taṃ acelakavagge pañcamasikkhāpadaṃ hoti, upanandattheraṃ ārabbha paññattesu pana catutthabhāvato ‘‘upanandassa catutthasikkhāpadenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Catutthasikkhāpadassa vatthuto imassa sikkhāpadassa vatthuno paṭhamaṃ uppannattā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamaṃ paññattaṃ. Iminā ca sikkhāpadena kevalaṃ bhikkhuniyā eva rahonisajjāya āpatti paññattā, upari mātugāmena saddhiṃ rahonisajjāya āpatti visuṃ paññattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Rahonisajjasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito bhikkhunivaggo tatiyo.

[03]^b^206^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bhojanavaggassa ^a^M3.0053^ea^^a^V3.0048^ea^ paṭhamasikkhāpade ^b^addhayojanaṃ vā yojanaṃ vā gantuṃ sakkotī^eb^ti ettha tattakaṃ gantuṃ sakkontassapi tāvatakaṃ gantvā aladdhabhikkhassa ito bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Imesaṃyevā^eb^ti imesaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃyeva. ^b^Ettakāna^eb^nti imasmiṃ pāsaṇḍe ettakānaṃ. ^b^Ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabba^eb^nti ekadivasaṃ sakiṃyeva bhuñjitabbaṃ. ‘‘Ekadivasaṃ bhuñjitabba’’nti vacanato pana ekasmiṃ divase punappunaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Puna ādito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti iminā paṭhamaṃ bhuttaṭṭhānesu puna ekasmimpi ṭhāne bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.

[03]^b^208^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Gacchanto vā āgacchanto vā^eb^ti idaṃ addhayojanavasena gahetabba’’nti vadanti. ^b^Antarāmagge gataṭṭhāne^eb^ti ekasseva santakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Āgacchantepi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^‘‘gantvā paccāgacchanto’’^eb^tiādimāha. Āpattiṭṭhāneyeva puna bhuñjantassa anāpatti vattabbāti gamane āgamane ca paṭhamaṃ bhojanaṃ avatvā antarāmagge ekadivasaṃ gataṭṭhāne ca ekadivasanti punappunaṃ bhojanameva dassitaṃ, gamanadivase pana āgamanadivase ca ‘‘gamissāmi āgamissāmī’’ti bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Suddhacittena punappunaṃ bhuñjantassapi punappunaṃ bhojane anāpatti. Aññassatthāya uddisitvā paññattaṃ bhikkhuno gahetumeva na vaṭṭatīti āha ^b^‘‘bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyā’’^eb^ti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Āvasathapiṇḍatā, agilānatā, anuvasitvā bhojananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Āvasathapiṇḍasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^abhimāre^eb^ti abhigantvā bhagavato māraṇatthāya niyojite dhanuddhare. ^b^Guḷhapaṭicchanno^eb^ti apākaṭo. ^b^Pavijjhī^eb^ti vissajjesi. Nanu ^b^rājānampi mārāpesī^eb^ti vacanato idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ ajātasattuno kāle paññattanti siddhaṃ, evañca sati parato anupaññattiyaṃ –

[08]‘‘Tena ^a^M3.0054^ea^^a^V3.0049^ea^ kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ñātisālohito ājīvakesu pabbajito hoti. Atha kho so ājīvako yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ etadavoca…pe… kukkuccāyantā nādhivāsentī’’ti –

[07]Idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? So kira ājīvako taṃ dānaṃ dento bimbisārakālato paṭṭhāya adāsi, pacchā ajātasattukāle sikkhāpadapaññattito paṭṭhāya bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā taṃ dānaṃ na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ vatthu dassitanti veditabbaṃ. ‘‘Atha kho so ājīvako bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesī’’ti idañca tato pabhuti so ājīvako antarantarā bhikkhū nimantetvā dānaṃ dento ajātasattukāle sikkhāpade paññatte yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^215^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aññamaññavisiṭṭhattā visadisaṃ rajjaṃ virajjaṃ, tato āgatā, tattha vā jātā, bhavāti vā verajjā, te eva ^b^verajjakā^eb^. Te pana yasmā gottacaraṇādivibhāgena nānappakārā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nānāverajjake’’^eb^ti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ^b^nānāvidhehi aññarajjehi āgate^eb^ti rajjānaṃyeva vasena nānappakāratā vuttā.

[03]^b^217-218^eb^^b^.^eb^ Imassa sikkhāpadassa viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā viññattito gaṇabhojanaṃ vatthuvaseneva pākaṭanti taṃ avatvā ‘‘gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha…pe… nimantitā bhuñjantī’’ti nimantanavaseneva padabhājane gaṇabhojanaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Kiñci pana sikkhāpadaṃ vatthuananurūpampi siyāti padabhājane vuttanayena nimantanavaseneva gaṇabhojanaṃ hotīti kesañci āsaṅkā bhaveyyā’’ti taṃnivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘taṃ panetaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi pasavatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘bhojanaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttepi gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevā’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Heṭṭhā addhānagamanavatthusmiṃ nāvābhiruhanavatthusmiñca ‘idheva, bhante, bhuñjathā’ti vutte yasmā kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, tasmā ‘bhuñjathā’ti vuttepi ^a^M3.0055^ea^ gaṇabhojanaṃ na hotiyevā’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimantetī’’ti vuttattā pana ‘‘odanaṃ bhuñjathā’’ti vā ‘‘bhattaṃ bhuñjathā’’ti vā bhojananāmaṃ gahetvāva vutte gaṇabhojanaṃ hoti, na aññathā. ‘‘Idheva, bhante, bhuñjathā’’ti etthāpi ‘‘odana’’nti vā ‘‘bhatta’’nti vā vatvāva te evaṃ nimantesunti gahetabbaṃ. Gaṇavasena vā ^a^V3.0050^ea^ nimantitattā te bhikkhū apakataññutāya kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti, vīmaṃsitvā yuttataraṃ gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekato gaṇhantī^eb^ti ettha aññamaññassa dvādasahatthaṃ amuñcitvā ṭhitā ekato gaṇhanti nāmāti gahetabbaṃ. ‘‘Amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehīti vā viññāpeyyu’’nti vacanato heṭṭhā ‘‘tvaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno bhattaṃ dehi, tvaṃ dvinnanti evaṃ viññāpetvā’’ti vacanato ca attano atthāya aññehi viññattampi sādiyantassa gaṇabhojanaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ viññattito pasavatī^eb^ti ettha viññattiyā sati gaṇhantassa ekato hutvā gahaṇe iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti, visuṃ gahaṇe paṇītabhojanasūpodanaviññattīhi āpatti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Vicāretī^eb^ti pañcakhaṇḍādivasena saṃvidahati. ^b^Ghaṭṭetī^eb^ti anuvātaṃ chinditvā hatthena daṇḍakena vā ghaṭṭeti. ^b^Suttaṃ karotī^eb^ti suttaṃ vaṭṭeti. ^b^Valetī^eb^ti daṇḍake vā hatthe vā āvaṭṭeti. ‘‘Abhinavasseva cīvarassa karaṇaṃ idha cīvarakammaṃ nāma, purāṇacīvare sūcikammaṃ nāma na hotī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Catutthe āgate na yāpentīti vacanato sace añño koci āgacchanto natthi, cattāroyeva ca tattha nisinnā yāpetuṃ na sakkonti, na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gaṇabhojanāpattijanakanimantanabhāvato ^b^‘‘akappiyanimantana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sampavesetvā^eb^ti nisīdāpetvā. ^b^Gaṇo bhijjatī^eb^ti gaṇo āpattiṃ na āpajjatīti adhippāyo. ‘‘Yattha cattāro bhikkhū…pe… bhuñjantī’’ti imāya pāḷiyā saṃsandanato ^b^‘‘itaresaṃ pana gaṇapūrako hotī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Avisesenā^eb^ti ‘‘gilāno vā cīvarakārako vā’’ti avisesetvā sabbasādhāraṇavacanena. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti avisesitattā. ^b^Bhutvā gatesū^eb^ti ettha agatesupi bhojanakicce niṭṭhite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati ^a^M3.0056^ea^. ^b^Tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitānī^eb^ti yehi bhojanehi visaṅketo natthi, tāni bhojanāni tehi bhikkhūhi ekato na gahitāni ekena pacchā gahitattā. ^b^Mahāthere^eb^ti bhikkhū sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dūtassa puna paṭipathaṃ āgantvā ‘‘bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vacanabhayena ^b^‘‘gāmadvāre aṭṭhatvāvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tattha tattha gantvā^eb^ti antaravīthiādīsu tattha tattha ṭhitānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā. Bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya gharadvāre ṭhapetvā diyyamānepi eseva nayo. ^b^Nivattathāti vuttapade nivattituṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ‘‘nivattathā’’ti vicchinditvā pacchā ‘‘bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vuttattā vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva. Gaṇabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^V3.0051^ea^ kulapaṭipāṭiyā abbocchinnaṃ katvā nirantaraṃ diyyamānattā ‘‘bhattapaṭipāṭi aṭṭhitā hotī’’ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, antarā aṭṭhatvā nirantaraṃ pavattāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Upacāravasenā^eb^ti vohāravasena. Na hi so badaramattameva deti, upacāravasena pana evaṃ vadati. Badaracuṇṇasakkharādīhi payojitaṃ ‘‘badarasāḷava’’nti vuccati.

[03]^b^226^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vikappanāvaseneva taṃ bhattaṃ asantaṃ nāma hotīti anupaññattivasena vikappanaṃ aṭṭhapetvā yathāpaññattaṃ sikkhāpadameva ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Parivāre^eb^ pana vikappanāya anujānanampi anupaññattisamānanti katvā ‘‘catasso anupaññattiyo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāpaccariādīsu^eb^ vuttanayaṃ pacchā vadanto pāḷiyā saṃsandanato parammukhāvikappanameva patiṭṭhāpesi. Keci pana ‘‘tadā attano santike ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññassa abhāvato thero sammukhāvikappanaṃ nākāsi, bhagavatā ca visuṃ sammukhāvikappanā na vuttā, tathāpi sammukhāvikappanāpi vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti. Teneva ^b^mātikā^eb^aṭṭhakathāyampi (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. paramparabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) ‘‘yo bhikkhu pañcasu sahadhammikesu aññatarassa ‘mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ dammī’ti vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ sammukhā vā ‘itthannāmassa dammī’ti ^a^M3.0057^ea^ vā ‘vikappemī’ti vā evaṃ parammukhā vā paṭhamanimantanaṃ avikappetvā pacchā nimantitakule laddhabhikkhato ekasitthampi ajjhoharati, pācittiya’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^229^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcahi bhojanehi nimantitassa yena yena paṭhamaṃ nimantito, tassa tassa bhojanato uppaṭipāṭiyā avikappetvā vā parassa parassa bhojanaṃ ^b^paramparabhojana^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘sace pana mūlanimantanaṃ heṭṭhā hoti, pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ upari, taṃ uparito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa āpattī’’^eb^ti. Hatthaṃ anto pavesetvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ gaṇhantassa majjhe ṭhitampi antohatthagataṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘hatthaṃ pana…pe… yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa anāpattī’’^eb^ti. Khīrassa rasassa ca bhattena amissaṃ hutvā upari ṭhitattā ^b^‘‘khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpattī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Mahāupāsako^eb^ti gehasāmiko. ^b^‘‘Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘āpattī’ti vacanena ^b^kurundiyaṃ^eb^ ‘vaṭṭatī’ti vacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati, dvinnampi adhippāyo ^b^mahāpaccariyaṃ^eb^ vibhāvito’’ti ^b^mahāgaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbe nimantentī^eb^ti akappiyanimantanena nimantenti. ‘‘Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma ^a^V3.0052^ea^ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito, taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati, etaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ nāmā’’ti vuttattā satipi bhikkhācariyāya paṭhamaṃ laddhabhāve ‘‘piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpattī’’ti vuttaṃ. Avikappavasena ^b^‘‘vacīkamma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Paramparabhojanatā, samayābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Paramparabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^230-231^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^kāṇāya mātā^eb^ti kāṇāti laddhanāmāya dārikāya mātā. Kasmā panesā kāṇā nāma jātāti āha ^b^‘‘sā kirassā’’^eb^tiādi. Imissā daharakāle mātāpitaro sinehavasena ‘‘amma kāṇe, amma kāṇe’’ti vohariṃsu, sā tadupādāya kāṇā nāma jātā, tassā ca mātā ‘‘kāṇamātā’’ti pākaṭā ahosīti ^a^M3.0058^ea^ evamettha kāraṇaṃ vadanti. ^b^Paṭiyāloka^eb^nti pacchimaṃ disaṃ, paccādiccanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pūvagaṇanāya pācittiya^eb^nti mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhato upariṭṭhitapūvagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ. ‘‘Dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā’’ti hi vacanato mukhavaṭṭiyā heṭṭhimalekhaṃ anatikkante dve vā tayo vā pattapūre gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhakathāsu pana…pe… vutta^eb^nti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tathā āgatabhāvamattadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana tassa vādassa patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāsu vuttañhi pāḷiyā na sameti. Tatuttarigahaṇe anāpattidassanatthañhi ‘‘ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’’nti vuttaṃ. Aññathā ‘‘anāpatti dvattipattapūre paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti imināva pamāṇayuttaggahaṇe anāpattisiddhito ‘‘ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna’’nti visuṃ na vattabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī’’ti kasmā na vuttanti? Heṭṭhā tatuttarisikkhāpade vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ. Vuttañhi tattha (pārā. aṭṭha. 2.526) ‘‘aṭṭhakathāsu pana ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne pakatiyāva bahumpi vaṭṭati, acchinnakāraṇā pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ pāḷiyā na sametī’’ti. ‘‘Apātheyyādiatthāya paṭiyādita’’nti saññāya gaṇhantassapi āpattiyeva acittakattā sikkhāpadassa. Attanoyeva gahaṇatthaṃ ‘‘imassa hatthe dehī’’ti vacanenapi āpajjanato ^b^‘‘vacīkamma’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva ^a^V3.0053^ea^. Vuttalakkhaṇapūvamanthatā, asesakatā, apaṭippassaddhagamanatā, na ñātakāditā, atirekapaṭiggahaṇanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Kāṇamātāsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^bhuttāvī^eb^ti bhuttāvino bhuttavanto, katabhattakiccāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Pavāritā^eb^ti ettha catūsu pavāraṇāsu yāvadatthapavāraṇā paṭikkhepapavāraṇā ca labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘brāhmaṇena…pe… paṭikkhepapavāraṇāya pavāritā’’^eb^ti. Catubbidhā hi pavāraṇā vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā, paccayapavāraṇā ^a^M3.0059^ea^, paṭikkhepapavāraṇā, yāvadatthapavāraṇāti. Tattha ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vassaṃvutthānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu’’nti (mahāva. 209) ayaṃ ^b^vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā^eb^. Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike bhajāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā, āpattivisodhanāya attavossaggokāsadānaṃ. Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā, tasmā ‘‘vassaṃvutthapavāraṇā’’ti vuccati. ‘‘Icchāmahaṃ, bhante, saṅghaṃ cātumāsaṃ bhesajjena pavāretu’’nti (pāci. 303) ca, ‘‘aññatra puna pavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāyā’’ti (pāci. 306) ca ayaṃ ^b^paccayapavāraṇā^eb^ pavāreti paccaye icchāpeti etāyāti katvā, cīvarādīhi upanimantanāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ‘‘Pavārito nāma asanaṃ paññāyati, bhojanaṃ paññāyati, hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharati, paṭikkhepo paññāyati, eso pavārito nāmā’’ti (pāci. 239) ayaṃ ^b^paṭikkhepapavāraṇā^eb^. Vippakatabhojanatādipañcaṅgasahito bhojanapaṭikkhepoyeva hettha pakārayuttā vāraṇāti pavāraṇā. ‘‘Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.363) ayaṃ ^b^yāvadatthapavāraṇā^eb^. Yāvadatthaṃ bhojanassa pavāraṇā yāvadatthapavāraṇā.
[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ti-kāraṃ avatvā…pe… vattuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti idaṃ vattabbākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Ti-kāre pana vuttepi akataṃ nāma na hotī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^238-239^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavārito^eb^ti paṭikkhepito. Yo hi bhuñjanto parivesakena upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati, so tena pavārito paṭikkhepito nāma hoti. Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katapavāraṇo katapaṭikkhepo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ‘‘asana’’nti ^a^V3.0054^ea^ imināva padena ‘‘bhuttāvī’’ti imassa attho vutto, tasmā na tassa kiñci payojanaṃ visuṃ upalabbhati. Yadi hi upalabbheyya, pavāraṇā chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā āpajjeyyāti manasi katvā pañcasamannāgatattaṃyeva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādinā pāḷiṃ āharati. Keci pana ‘‘hatthapāse ṭhito abhiharatī’’ti ekameva aṅgaṃ katvā ‘‘caturaṅgasamannāgatā pavāraṇā’’tipi vadanti.

[03]^b^Ambilapāyāsādīsū^eb^ti ^a^M3.0060^ea^^b^ādi^eb^-saddena khīrapāyāsādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tattha ambilapāyāsaggahaṇena takkādiambilasaṃyuttā ghanayāgu vuttā. Khīrapāyāsaggahaṇena khīrasaṃyuttā yāgu saṅgayhati. ^b^Pavāraṇaṃ na janetī^eb^ti anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhanaṃ paṭikkhepaṃ na sādheti. Katopi paṭikkhepo anatirittabhojanāpattinibandhano na hotīti akataṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha ^b^‘‘pavāraṇaṃ na janetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^‘‘Yāgu^eb^-saddassa pavāraṇajanakayāguyāpi sādhāraṇattā ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttepi pavāraṇā hotīti pavāraṇaṃ janetiyevāti vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ parato tattheva ‘‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’’ti ettha vuttakāraṇena na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha ‘‘heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti, ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotī’’ti. Tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva khīrādīhi saṃmadditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vuttattā yāguyā ca tattha abhāvato pavāraṇā hotīti evamettha kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati parato ‘‘yenāpucchito, tassa atthitāyā’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakāraṇenapi saṃsandati, aññathā gaṇṭhipadesuyeva pubbāparavirodho āpajjati. Aṭṭhakathāvacanena ca na sameti. ^b^Sace…pe… paññāyatī^eb^ti iminā vuttappamāṇassa macchamaṃsakhaṇḍassa nahāruno vā sabbhāvamattaṃ dasseti. ^b^Tāhī^eb^ti puthukāhi.

[03]^b^Sālivīhiyavehi katasattū^eb^ti yebhuyyanayena vuttaṃ, satta dhaññāni pana bhajjitvā katopi sattuyeva. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kaṅguvaraka…pe… sattusaṅgahameva gacchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattumodako^eb^ti sattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakko sattuguḷo. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataravasena vippakatabhojanabhāvassa upacchinnattā ^b^‘‘mukhe sāsapamattampi…pe… na pavāretī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Akappiyamaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati, na pavāretī’’^eb^ti vacanato sace saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ attano apāpuṇantaṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā paṭikkhipati, na pavāreti paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittattā. Alajjisantakaṃ paṭikkhipantopi na pavāreti. ^b^Avatthutāyā^eb^ti anatirittāpattisādhikāya pavāraṇāya avatthubhāvato. Etena paṭikkhipitabbasseva paṭikkhittabhāvaṃ dīpeti ^a^M3.0061^ea^. Yañhi paṭikkhipitabbaṃ ^a^V3.0055^ea^ hoti, tassa paṭikkhepo āpattiaṅgaṃ na hotīti taṃ ‘‘pavāraṇāya avatthū’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Upanāmetī^eb^ti iminā kāyābhihāraṃ dasseti. Hatthapāsato bahi ṭhitassa satipi dātukāmābhihāre paṭikkhipantassa dūrabhāveneva pavāraṇāya abhāvato therassapi dūrabhāvamattaṃ gahetvā pavāraṇāya abhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘therassa dūrabhāvato’’^eb^ti āha, na pana therassa abhihārasabbhāvato. Sacepi gahetvā gato hatthapāse ṭhito hoti, kiñci pana avatvā ādhārakaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abhihāro nāma na hotīti ^b^‘‘dūtassa ca anabhiharaṇato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Gahetvā gatena ‘bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vutte abhihāro nāma hotīti ^b^‘sace pana gahetvā āgato bhikkhu…pe… pavāraṇā hotī’^eb^ti vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘pattaṃ kiñci upanāmetvā ‘imaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttanti gahetabba’’nti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati vācābhihārassa idha anadhippetattā.

[03]^b^Parivesanāyā^eb^ti bhattagge. ^b^Abhihaṭāva hotī^eb^ti parivesakeneva abhihaṭā hoti. ^b^Tato dātukāmatāya gaṇhantaṃ paṭikkhipantassa pavāraṇā hotī^eb^ti ettha agaṇhantampi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotiyeva. Kasmā? Dātukāmatāya abhihaṭattā. ‘‘Tasmā sā abhihaṭāva hotī’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Teneva tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ ‘‘dātukāmābhihāre sati kevalaṃ ‘dassāmī’ti gahaṇameva abhihāro nāma na hoti, ‘dassāmī’ti gaṇhantepi agaṇhantepi dātukāmābhihārova abhihāro nāma hoti, tasmā gahaṇasamaye vā aggahaṇasamaye vā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotī’’ti vuttaṃ. Idāni asati tassa dātukāmābhihāre gahaṇasamayepi paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^‘‘Rasaṃ gaṇhathā’’^eb^ti apavāraṇajanakassa nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttattā ^b^‘‘taṃ sutvā paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā natthī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Maccharasaṃ maṃsarasa^eb^nti ettha pana na kevalaṃ macchassa rasaṃ maccharasamicceva viññāyati, atha kho maccho ca maccharasañca maccharasanti evaṃ pavāraṇajanakasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi viññāyamānattā ^a^M3.0062^ea^ taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāva hoti. Parato ^b^macchasūpa^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^‘‘Idaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vuttepī^eb^ti ettha evaṃ avatvāpi pavāraṇapahonakaṃ yaṃkiñci abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Karambako^eb^ti missakādhivacanametaṃ. Yañhi aññenaññena missetvā karonti, so ‘‘karambako’’ti vuccati. So sacepi maṃsena missetvā katova hoti, ‘‘karambakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti apavāraṇārahassa nāmena vuttattā ^a^V3.0056^ea^ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti. ‘‘Maṃsakarambakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vutte pana maṃsamissakaṃ gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti, tasmā pavāraṇāva hoti.

[03]^b^‘‘Uddissakata’’nti maññamāno^eb^ti ettha ‘‘vatthuno kappiyattā akappiyasaññāya paṭikkhipatopi acittakattā imassa sikkhāpadassa pavāraṇā hotī’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Heṭṭhā ayāguke nimantane udakakañjikakhīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’ti vuttattā pavāraṇā hoti, ‘bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā’ti ettha pana visuṃ yāguyā vijjamānattā pavāraṇā na hotī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Ayamettha adhippāyo^eb^ti ‘‘yenāpucchito’’tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ panettha duddasa^eb^nti ettha eke tāva vadanti ‘‘yasmā yāgumissakaṃ nāma bhattameva na hoti, khīrādikampi hotiyeva, tasmā karambake viya pavāraṇāya na bhavitabbaṃ. Evañca sati yāgu bahutarā vā hoti samasamā vā, na pavāreti. ‘Yāgu mandā, bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ, pavāretī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa’’nti. Keci pana vadanti ‘‘yāgumissakaṃ nāma bhattaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇāya eva bhavitabbaṃ. Evañca sati ‘idha pavāraṇā hoti na hotī’ti ettha kāraṇaṃ duddasa’’nti.

[03]Yathā cettha kāraṇaṃ duddasaṃ, evaṃ parato ‘‘missakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti etthāpi kāraṇaṃ duddasamevāti veditabbaṃ. Na hi pavāraṇappahonakassa appabahubhāvo pavāraṇāya bhāvābhāvanimittaṃ, kiñcarahi pavāraṇajanakassa nāmaggahaṇamevettha pamāṇaṃ, tasmā ‘‘idañca karambakena na samānetabba’’ntiādinā yampi kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi pubbe vuttena saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti. Yadi hi ‘‘missaka’’nti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhaṃ siyā, evaṃ sati yathā ‘‘bhattamissakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vutte bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti, pavāretiyeva, evaṃ ‘‘missakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vuttepi appatarepi ^a^M3.0063^ea^ bhatte pavāraṇāya bhavitabbaṃ ^b^missaka^eb^nti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhattā. Tathā hi ‘‘missakanti bhattamissakeyeva ruḷhavohārattā idaṃ pana ‘bhattamissakamevā’ti vutta’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Atha ‘‘missaka’’nti bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ na hoti, missakabhattaṃ pana sandhāya ‘‘missakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vuttanti. Evampi yathā ayāguke nimantane khīrādīhi saddhiṃ madditaṃ bhattameva sandhāya ‘‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vutte pavāraṇā hoti, evamidhāpi missakabhattameva sandhāya ‘‘missakaṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vutte bhattaṃ appaṃ vā hotu bahu vā, pavāraṇā eva siyā. Tasmā ‘‘missaka’’nti bhattamissake ruḷhaṃ vā hotu sandhāyabhāsitaṃ vā, ubhayatthāpi pubbenāparaṃ na sametīti kimettha kāraṇacintāya, īdisesu pana ṭhānesu aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gantabbanti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti.

[03]^b^‘‘Visuṃ^eb^^a^V3.0057^ea^^b^katvā detī^eb^ti bhattassa upari ṭhitaṃ rasādiṃ visuṃ gahetvā detī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘yathā bhattasitthaṃ na patati, tathā gāḷhaṃ hatthena pīḷetvā parissāvetvā detī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tathāpi kāraṇaṃ na dissati. Yathā hi bhattamissakaṃ yāguṃ āharitvā ‘‘yāguṃ gaṇhathā’’ti vatvā yāgumissakaṃ bhattampi dentaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā na hoti, evamidhāpi bahukhīrarasādīsu bhattesu ‘‘khīraṃ gaṇhathā’’tiādīni vatvā khīrādīni vā detu khīrādimissakabhattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pavāraṇāya na bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā ‘‘visuṃ katvā detī’’ti tenākārena dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā diyyamānaṃ paṭikkhipato pavāraṇā hotīti dassanatthanti gahetabbaṃ. Yadi pana bhattamissakaṃ katvā diyyamāne pavāraṇā hotīti adhippāyena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘visuṃ katvā detī’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathāyevettha pamāṇanti gahetabbaṃ, na pana kāraṇantaraṃ gavesitabbaṃ.

[03]Sace ukkuṭikaṃ nisinno pāde amuñcitvāpi bhūmiyaṃ nisīdati, iriyāpathaṃ vikopento nāma hotīti ukkuṭikāsanaṃ avikopetvāva sukhena nisīdituṃ ^b^‘‘tassa pana heṭṭhā…pe… nisīdanakaṃ dātabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Āsanaṃ acāletvā^eb^ti pīṭhe phuṭṭhokāsato ānisadamaṃsaṃ amocetvā, anuṭṭhahitvāti vuttaṃ hoti, adinnādāne viya ṭhānācāvanaṃ na gahetabba’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Akappiyakata^eb^nti ^a^M3.0064^ea^ ettha akappiyakatasseva anatirittabhāvato kappiyaṃ akārāpetvā tasmiṃ patte pakkhittamūlaphalādiyeva atirittaṃ na hoti, sesaṃ pana pattapariyāpannaṃ atirittameva hoti, paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Taṃ pana mūlaphalādiṃ paribhuñjitukāmena tato nīharitvā kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^So puna kātuṃ na labhatī^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva bhājane kariyamānaṃ paṭhamaṃ katena saddhiṃ kataṃ hotīti puna soyeva kātuṃ na labhati, añño labhati. Aññasmiṃ pana bhājane tena vā aññena vā kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yena akataṃ, tena kātabbaṃ. Yañca akataṃ, taṃ kātabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tenapī^eb^ti ettha ^b^pi^eb^-saddo na kevalaṃ aññena vāti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. ^b^Evaṃ kata^eb^nti aññasmiṃ bhājane kataṃ. ^b^Pesetvā^eb^ti anupasampannassa hatthe pesetvā. Imassa vinayakammabhāvato ^b^‘‘anupasampannassa hatthe ṭhitaṃ na kāretabba’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Sace pana āmisasaṃsaṭṭhānī^eb^ti ettha sace mukhagatenapi anatirittena āmisena saṃsaṭṭhāni honti ^a^V3.0058^ea^, pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ. Tasmā pavāritena bhojanaṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvā bhuñjantenapi yathā akatena missaṃ na hoti, evaṃ mukhañca hatthañca suddhaṃ katvā bhuñjitabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi appavāritassa purebhattaṃ yāmakālikādīni āhāratthāya paribhuñjatopi anāpatti, pavāritassa pana pavāraṇamūlakaṃ dukkaṭaṃ hotiyevāti ‘‘yāmakālikaṃ…pe… ajjhohāre āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^241^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāyena bhuñjanato vācāya āṇāpetvā atirittaṃ akārāpanato ca āpajjatīti ^b^‘‘kāyavācato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pavāritabhāvo, āmisassa anatirittatā, kāle ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Paṭhamapavāraṇāsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^243^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0065^ea^^b^sādhāraṇamevā^eb^ti ‘‘handa bhikkhu khāda vā’’tiādinā vuttapavāraṇāya sādhāraṇaṃ. ‘‘Bhuttasmiṃ pācittiya’’nti mātikāyaṃ vuttattā bhojanapariyosāne āpatti, na ajjhohāre ajjhohāre. ^b^Abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreti, āpatti pācittiyassā^eb^ti idañca bhojanapariyosānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pavāritatā, pavāritasaññitā, āsādanāpekkhatā, anatirittena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāraṇā, bhojanapariyosānanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Dutiyapavāraṇāsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^247^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^aggasamajjo^eb^ti uttamaṃ naccaṃ. Taṃ kira pabbatamatthake ṭhatvā ekaṃ devataṃ uddissa karonti. Naṭānaṃ nāṭakāni ^b^naṭanāṭakāni,^eb^ sītāharaṇādīni. ^b^Apaññatte sikkhāpade^eb^ti ūnavīsativassasikkhāpade apaññatte. ^b^Adaṃsū^eb^ti ‘‘vihāraṃ netvā khādissathā’’ti adaṃsu.

[03]^b^248-249^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mūlakamūlādīni upadesatoyeva veditabbāni. Na hi tāni pariyāyantarena vuccamānānipi ^a^V3.0059^ea^ sakkā viññātuṃ. Pariyāyantarepi hi vuccamāne taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ ajānantānaṃ sammohoyeva siyā, tasmā tattha na kiñci vakkhāma. ^b^Khādanīyattha^eb^nti khādanīyena kattabbakiccaṃ. ^b^Neva pharantī^eb^ti na nipphādenti. ^b^Tesu tesu janapadesū^eb^ti ettha ‘‘ekasmiṃ janapade āhārakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ sesajanapadesupi na kappatī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Rukkhavalliādīna^eb^nti heṭṭhā vuttameva sampiṇḍetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Antopathavīgato^eb^ti sālakalyāṇīkhandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbakappiyānī^eb^ti mūlakhandhatacapattādivasena sabbaso kappiyāni. Tesampi nāmavasena na sakkā pariyantaṃ dassetunti sambandho. Acchivādīnaṃ aparipakkāneva phalāni yāvajīvikānīti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aparipakkānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Harītakādīnaṃ aṭṭhīnī^eb^ti ettha miñjaṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitakapālāni yāvajīvikānīti ācariyā. Miñjampi yāvajīvikanti eke. ^b^Hiṅgū^eb^ti hiṅgurukkhato paggharitaniyyāso. Hiṅgujatuādayopi hiṅguvikatiyo eva. Tattha ^b^hiṅgujatu^eb^^a^M3.0066^ea^ nāma hiṅgurukkhassa daṇḍapattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso, ^b^hiṅgusipāṭikaṃ^eb^ nāma hiṅgupattāni pacitvā kataniyyāso. ‘‘Aññena missetvā kato’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Taka^eb^nti aggakoṭiyā nikkhantasileso. ^b^Takapatti^eb^nti pattato nikkhantasileso. ^b^Takapaṇṇi^eb^nti palāse bhajjitvā katasileso. ‘‘Daṇḍato nikkhantasileso tipi vadanti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Vikālatā, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^252-3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^tādisa^eb^nti asūpabyañjanaṃ. ^b^Yaṃkiñci yāvakālikaṃ vā yāmakālikaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘yāmakālika’’nti iminā na kevalaṃ yāvakālike eva sannidhipaccayā pācittiyaṃ, atha kho yāmakālikepīti dasseti. Nanu ca yāmakālikaṃ neva khādanīyesu antogadhaṃ, na bhojanīyesu. Teneva padabhājanīye ‘‘khādanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanāni yāmakālikaṃ sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma. Bhojanīyaṃ nāma pañca bhojanānī’’ti vuttaṃ, ‘‘yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiya’’nti ca vuttaṃ, tasmā yāmakālike pācittiyena bhavitabbanti kathaṃ viññāyatīti? Vuccate – padabhājane ^b^khādanīya^eb^-saddassa atthadassanatthaṃ ‘‘yāmakālikaṃ ^a^V3.0060^ea^ ṭhapetvā’’ti vuttaṃ, na pana sannidhipaccayā anāpattidassanatthaṃ. Khāditabbañhi yaṃkiñci khādanīyanti adhippetaṃ, na ca yāmakālikesu kiñci khāditabbaṃ atthi pātabyabhāvato. Tasmā kiñcāpi yāmakālikaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyehi na saṅgahitaṃ, tathāpi anāpattiṃ dassentena ‘‘anāpatti yāmakālikaṃ yāme nidahitvā bhuñjatī’’ti vacanato yāmātikkame sannidhipaccayā pācittiyena bhavitabbanti viññāyati. ‘‘Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ tadahupaṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappatī’’ti (mahāva. 305) imināpi ^a^M3.0067^ea^ cāyamattho siddho. Teneva bhagavato adhippāyaññūhi aṭṭhakathācariyehi yāmakālike pācittiyameva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭiggahaṇe^eb^ti gahaṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. Paṭiggahitameva hi taṃ, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Teneva ^b^‘‘ajjhoharitukāmatāya gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. sannidhikārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) pana ‘‘ajjhoharissāmīti gaṇhantassa paṭiggahaṇe’’icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yaṃ pattaṃ. ^b^Sandissatī^eb^ti yāguyā upari sandissati. Telavaṇṇe patte satipi nisnehabhāve aṅguliyā ghaṃsantassa vaṇṇavaseneva lekhā paññāyati, tasmā tattha anāpattīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘sā abbohārikā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattameva hi dutiyadivase na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha paṭiggahaṇe anapekkhavissajjanena anupasampannassa nirapekkhadānena vā vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ pariccattameva hotīti ‘‘apariccatta’’nti iminā ubhayathāpi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ parassa pariccajitvā adinnampi sace paṭiggahaṇe nirapekkhavissajjanena vijahitapaṭiggahaṇaṃ hoti, tampi dutiyadivase vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Yadi evaṃ ‘‘patto duddhoto hotī’’tiādīsu kasmā āpatti vuttāti? ‘‘Paṭiggahaṇaṃ avissajjetvāva sayaṃ vā aññena vā tucchaṃ katvā na sammā dhovitvā niṭṭhāpite patte laggampi avijahitapaṭiggahaṇameva hotīti tattha āpattī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘sāmaṇerānaṃ pariccajantīti imasmiṃ adhikāre ṭhatvā ‘apariccattamevā’ti vuttattā anupasampannassa pariccattameva vaṭṭati, apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatīti āpannaṃ, tasmā nirālayabhāvena paṭiggahaṇe vijahitepi anupasampannassa apariccattaṃ na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ viya na dissati. Yadaggena hi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati, tadaggena sannidhimpi na karoti vijahitapaṭiggahaṇassa appaṭiggahitasadisattā. Paṭiggahetvā nidahiteyeva ca sannidhipaccayā āpatti vuttā. ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā ekarattaṃ vītināmitassetaṃ adhivacana’’nti hi vuttaṃ.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ ^a^V3.0061^ea^ ‘‘sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ āhāratthāya paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’tiādinā sannihitesu sattāhakālikayāvajīvikesu purebhattampi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇepi dukkaṭassa vuttattā ^a^M3.0068^ea^ yāmakālikepi āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇe visuṃ dukkaṭenapi bhavitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘āhāratthāya ajjhoharato dukkaṭena saddhiṃ pācittiya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pakatiāmise^eb^ti odanādikappiyāmise. ^b^Yāmakālikaṃ sati paccaye sāmisena mukhena ajjhoharato dve^eb^ti hiyyo paṭiggahitayāmakālikaṃ ajja purebhattaṃ sāmisena mukhena bhuñjato sannihitayāmakālikapaccayā ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ, sannihitena saṃsaṭṭhaāmisapaccayā ekanti dve pācittiyāni. ^b^Vikappadvayepī^eb^ti sāmisena nirāmisenāti vuttavidhānadvaye. ^b^Dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhatī^eb^ti āhāratthāya ajjhoharaṇapaccayā dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati. ^b^Thullaccayañca dukkaṭañca vaḍḍhatī^eb^ti manussamaṃse thullaccayaṃ, sesaakappiyamaṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ vaḍḍhati.

[03]^b^255^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭiggahaṇapaccayā tāva dukkaṭa^eb^nti ettha sannihitattā purebhattampi dukkaṭameva. Sati paccaye pana sannihitampi sattāhakālikaṃ yāvajīvikaṃ bhesajjatthāya gaṇhantassa paribhuñjantassa ca anāpattiyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva. Yāvakālikayāmakālikatā, sannidhibhāvo, tassa ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Sannidhikārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^257-259^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni bhojanāni ^b^paṇītabhojanāni^eb^. Yathā hi ājaññayutto ratho ‘‘ājaññaratho’’ti vuccati, evamidhāpi paṇītasaṃsaṭṭhāni sattadhaññanibbattāni bhojanāni ‘‘paṇītabhojanānī’’ti vuttāni. Yehi pana paṇītehi saṃsaṭṭhāni, tāni ‘‘paṇītabhojanānī’’ti vuccanti, tesaṃ pabhedadassanatthaṃ ‘‘seyyathidaṃ, sappi navanīta’’ntiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘‘Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī’’ti idañca pācittiyavatthuparicchedadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana kappiyavatthuparicchedadassanatthaṃ. Na hi akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ sappiādīni na kappanti. Ekañhi manussavasātelaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbesaṃ khīrasappinavanītavasātelesu akappiyaṃ nāma natthi. ^b^Sappibhatta^eb^nti ettha kiñcāpi sappisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhattaṃ sappibhattaṃ, sappi ca bhattañca sappibhattantipi viññāyati, aṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘‘sālibhattaṃ viya sappibhattaṃ nāma natthī’’ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā dukkaṭasseva ^a^V3.0062^ea^ daḷhataraṃ ^a^M3.0069^ea^ katvā vuttattā na sakkā aññaṃ vattuṃ. Aṭṭhakathācariyā eva hi īdisesu ṭhānesu pamāṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Mūla^eb^nti kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Anāpattī^eb^ti visaṅketattā sabbāhiyeva āpattīhi anāpatti. Keci pana ‘‘pācittiyeneva anāpatti vuttā, sūpodanaviññattidukkaṭaṃ pana hotiyevā’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Kappiyasappinā akappiyasappinā^eb^ti ca idaṃ kappiyākappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tasmā kappiyamaṃsasappinā akappiyamaṃsasappināti evamettha attho gahetabbo. ^b^Nānāvatthukānī^eb^ti sappinavanītādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^261^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo^eb^ti ettha –
[08]‘‘Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsapaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra niccapavāraṇāya, tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiya’’nti (pāci. 306) –

[07]Idaṃ mahānāmasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. Iminā ca sikkhāpadena saṅghavasena gilānapaccayapavāraṇāya pavāritaṭṭhāne sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti, ettakāyeva rattiyo ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānīti. Atha tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari na bhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmā agilāno gilānasaññī hutvā pañca bhesajjāni viññāpento na bhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpento nāma hotīti ‘‘mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Etāni pāṭidesanīyavatthūnī^eb^ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatasappiādīni sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni pana akappiyasappiādīni bhikkhunīnampi dukkaṭavatthūnīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sūpodanaviññattiya^eb^nti bhikkhūnaṃ pācittiyavatthūni bhikkhunīnaṃ pāṭidesanīyavatthūni ca ṭhapetvā avasesaviññattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Paṇītabhojanatā, agilānatā, akataviññattiyā paṭilābho, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Paṇītabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^263^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M3.0070^ea^^a^V3.0063^ea^^b^ayyavosāṭitakānī^eb^ti pitupiṇḍassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Ummāre^eb^ti susāne katagehassa attano gehassa vā ummāre. ^b^Ghanabaddho^eb^ti ghanamaṃsena sambaddho, kathinasaṃhatasarīroti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^264^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mukhadvāra^eb^nti galanāḷikaṃ. ^b^Āhāra^eb^nti ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃkiñci yāvakālikādiṃ. ^b^Āhareyyā^eb^ti mukhadvāraṃ paveseyya. Mukhena vā paviṭṭhaṃ hotu nāsikāya vā, galena ajjhoharaṇīyattā sabbampi taṃ mukhadvāraṃ pavesitameva hoti. Yasmā pana te bhikkhū anāhārepi udake āhārasaññāya dantapone ca mukhadvāraṃ āhaṭaṃ idanti saññāya kukkuccāyiṃsu, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘te bhikkhū adinnaṃ…pe… sammā atthaṃ asallakkhetvā kukkuccāyiṃsū’’^eb^ti. Udakañhi yathāsukhaṃ pātuṃ dantakaṭṭhañca dantaponaparibhogena paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, tassa pana rasaṃ gilituṃ na vaṭṭati. Sacepi dantakaṭṭharaso ajānantassa anto pavisati, pācittiyameva. Anajjhoharantena pana dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aññaṃ vā, kiñci mukhe pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^265^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akallako^eb^ti gilāno sahatthā paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto mukhena paṭiggaṇhāti. ^b^Uccāraṇamatta^eb^nti ukkhipanamattaṃ. ^b^Ekadesenapī^eb^ti aṅguliyāpi phuṭṭhamattena. ^b^Taṃ ce paṭiggaṇhāti, sabbaṃ paṭiggahitamevā^eb^ti veṇukoṭiyā bandhitvā ṭhapitattā. Sacepi bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitameva ghaṭaṃ dāyakena hatthapāse ṭhatvā ghaṭaṃ dassāmīti dinnaveṇukoṭiggahaṇavasena paṭiggaṇhāti, ubhayakoṭibaddhaṃ sabbampi paṭiggahitameva hoti. Bhikkhussa atthāya apīḷetvā pakatiyā pīḷiyamānaucchurasaṃ sandhāya ‘‘gaṇhathā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘abhihāro na paññāyatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Hatthapāse ṭhitassa pana bhikkhussa atthāya pīḷiyamānā ucchuto paggharantaṃ rasaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati, doṇikāya sayaṃ paggharantaṃ ucchurasaṃ majjhe āvaritvā āvaritvā vissajjitampi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Katthaci^eb^ aṭṭhakathāsu.

[03]^b^Asaṃhārime^eb^ti thāmamajjhimena purisena asaṃhāriye. ^b^‘‘Tintiṇikādipaṇṇesū’’^eb^ti vacanato sākhāsu paṭiggahaṇaṃ ruhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘puñchite paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, tasmā puñchitvā gahetvāti ^a^M3.0071^ea^ evamattho gahetabbo’’ti vadanti. Puñchitvā paṭiggahetvā vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Patte patitarajanacuṇṇañhi abbhantaraparibhogatthāya ^a^V3.0064^ea^ aparihaṭabhāvato paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Pubbābhogassa anurūpena ^b^‘‘anupasampannassa datvā…pe… vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ ‘‘aññassa dassāmī’’ti cittuppādamattena parasantakaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā tassa adatvāpi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Bhikkhussa detī^eb^ti aññassa bhikkhussa deti. ^b^Kañjika^eb^nti khīrarasādiṃ yaṃkiñci dravaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Hatthato mocetvā puna gaṇhāti, uggahitakaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘hatthato amocentenevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ālulentāna^eb^nti ālolentānaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Āharitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitattā abhihāro natthīti āha ^b^‘‘patto paṭiggahetabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhamataraṃ uḷuṅkato thevā patte patantī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘yathā paṭhamataraṃ patitatheve doso natthi, tathā ākiritvā apanentānaṃ pacchā patitathevepi abhihaṭattā nevatthi doso’’ti vadanti. ^b^Carukenā^eb^ti khuddakabhājanena. ^b^Mukhavaṭṭiyāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti mukhavaṭṭiṃ ukkhipitvā hatthe phusāpite gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti kāyapaṭibaddhapaṭibaddhampi kāyapaṭibaddhamevāti ayaṃ nayo. Tathā ca tattha kāyapaṭibaddhe taṃpaṭibaddhe ca thullaccayameva vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tenā^eb^ti yassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gataṃ, tena. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā mūlaṭṭhasseva paribhogo anuññāto, tasmā. Taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anāmasitvā’’^eb^ti. Appaṭiggahitattā ^b^‘‘sannidhipaccayā anāpattī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hotīti āha ^b^‘‘paṭiggahetvā pana paribhuñjitabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Taṃ divasaṃ…pe… na tato para’’^eb^nti vacanato taṃ divasaṃ hatthena gahetvā vā aggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hoti, hatthena gahetvā ṭhapitaṃ dutiyadivase paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa pana uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti. Appaṭiggahitameva hi hatthena gahetvā ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^‘‘Sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjitu’’^eb^nti hi vacanato appaṭiggahitasseva tasmiṃ divase paribhogo anuññāto. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^gaṇṭhipade ‘‘taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatī^eb^ti ettha yathā gaṇabhojanādīsu gilānādīnaṃ ^a^M3.0072^ea^ kukkuccāyantānaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ anuññātaṃ, evamidhāpi bhagavatā paṭiggahitameva kukkuccavinodanatthaṃ anuññāta’’nti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ‘‘Taṃ diyyamānaṃ patatī’’ti avisesena vuttattā catūsupi kālikesu ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Satthakenā^eb^ti paṭiggahitasatthakena. Kasmā panettha uggahitapaccayā sannidhipaccayā vā doso ^a^V3.0065^ea^ na siyāti āha ^b^‘‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’’^eb^ti. Imināva bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā anupasampannena dinnaṃ vā gahetvā pariharituṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. Tasmā pattasammakkhanādiatthaṃ sāmaṃ gahetvā parihaṭatelādiṃ sace paribhuñjitukāmo hoti, paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa anāpatti. Abbhantaraparibhogatthaṃ pana sāmaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa uggahitakapaṭiggahitaṃ hoti, appaṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa adinnamukhadvārāpatti hoti, abbhantaraparibhogatthameva anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa siṅgīloṇakappo viya sannidhipaccayā āpatti hoti. Keci pana ‘‘thāmamajjhimassa purisassa uccāraṇamattaṃ hotītiādinā vuttapañcaṅgasampattiyā paṭiggahaṇassa ruhanato bāhiraparibhogatthampi sace anupasampannena dinnaṃ gaṇhāti, paṭiggahitamevā’’ti vadanti. Evaṃ sati idha bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ anupasampannena dinnaṃ gahetvā pariharantassa sannidhipaccayā āpatti vattabbā siyā, ‘‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’’ti ca na vattabbaṃ, tasmā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahitaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ nāma na hotīti veditabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ pañcasu paṭiggahaṇaṅgesu ‘‘paribhogatthāyā’’ti visesanaṃ vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṃ. Paṭiggahaṇañhi paribhogatthameva hotīti ‘‘paribhogatthāyā’’ti visuṃ avatvā ‘‘tañce bhikkhu kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Apare pana ‘‘satipi paṭiggahaṇe ‘na hi taṃ paribhogatthāya pariharantī’ti idha aparibhogatthāya pariharaṇe anāpatti vuttā’’ti vadanti. ^b^Udukkhalamusalāni khiyyantī^eb^ti ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati, na vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotī^eb^ti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabbo^eb^ti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthalaggena ^a^M3.0073^ea^ āmisena dosābhāvatthaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇanti abbhantaraparibhogatthameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte patati…pe… paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatī^eb^ti ettha punappunaṃ gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittameva ‘‘attano santaka’’nti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇato hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati, paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva ‘‘attano santaka’’nti sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. ^b^Kesañci atthāya odanaṃ pakkhipatī^eb^ti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi ‘‘āgantvā gaṇhissatī’’ti sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati, anupasampannassa hatthe pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati pariccattabhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sāmaṇera…pe… pariccattattā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ^eb^ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ. Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva ^a^V3.0066^ea^ aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi, tathāpi na pidahitabbanti aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Macchikavāraṇattha^eb^nti ettha ‘‘sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati, sukhena paribhuñjituṃ sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Apare pana ‘‘macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ gahita’’nti vadanti. ^b^Tasmimpi asatī^eb^ti cāṭiyā vā kuṇḍake vā asati. ^b^Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvā^eb^ti taṃyeva ajjhoharaṇīyabhaṇḍaṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā. ^b^Therassa pattaṃ anutherassā^eb^ti therassa pattaṃ attanā gahetvā anutherassa deti. ^b^Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehī^eb^ti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti. ^b^Ettha panā^eb^ti paṇḍito sāmaṇerotiādipattaparivattanakathāya. ^b^Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabba^eb^nti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati, evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ na labhatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho.

[03]Ettha pana ‘‘sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ karontīti vitakkuppatti sambhavati, tasmā taṃ parivattetvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā gahaṇe ^a^M3.0074^ea^ paribhogāsā natthi, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī’’ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Teneva ^b^ācariyabuddhadattattherena^eb^pi vuttaṃ –
[21]‘‘Mātāpitūnamatthāya, telādiharatopi ca;
[22]Sākhaṃ chāyādiatthāya, imesaṃ na visesati.
[21]‘‘Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
[22]Tassa sālayabhāvaṃ tu, visesaṃ takkayāma ta’’nti.

[03]Idamevettha yuttataraṃ avassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattiyā sambhavato. Na sakkā hi ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti. Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ. Yattha hi vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkā, tattha nevatthi doso. Teneva vakkhati ‘‘sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī’’ti.

[03]^b^Niccāletuṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti niccāletvā sakkharā apanetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^Ādhārake patto ṭhapito^eb^^a^V3.0067^ea^^b^hotī^eb^ti paṭiggahetabbapattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Cāletī^eb^ti vinā kāraṇaṃ cāleti. Satipi kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kiñcāpi ‘‘anujānāmi, bhikkhave, amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita’’nti (mahāva. 264) tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, ‘‘āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī’’ti ca sāmaññato paṭikkhittaṃ, tathāpi attano aññassa vā bhikkhuno atthāya aggahitattā ^b^‘‘sīhavighāsādiṃ…pe… vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetu^eb^nti mayhampi detīti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti, sāmaṇerassa dassāmīti suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti.

[03]^b^Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ hotī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Koṭṭhāse karotī^eb^ti bhikkhusāmaṇerā ca attano attano abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantūti sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti. ^b^Gahitāvasesa^eb^nti ^a^M3.0075^ea^ sāmaṇerehi gahitakoṭṭhāsato avasesaṃ. ^b^Gaṇhitvā^eb^ti ‘‘mayhaṃ idaṃ gaṇhissāmī’’ti gahetvā. Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ. ^b^Paṭiggahetvā^eb^ti tadahu paṭiggahetvā. Teneva ^b^‘‘yāvakālikena yāvajīvikasaṃsagge doso natthī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sace pana purimadivase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti, sāmisena mukhena tassā vaṭṭiyā dhūmaṃ pivituṃ na vaṭṭati. ^b^Samuddodakenā^eb^ti appaṭiggahitasamuddodakena. Yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakaṃ pasādetvā visuṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā ^b^‘‘abbohārika’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Laggatī^eb^ti mukhe hatthe ca udake sukkhe setavaṇṇaṃ dassentaṃ laggati. ^b^Pānīyaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti attanoyeva atthāya gahetvā. Sace pana pītāvasesaṃ tattheva ākirissāmīti gaṇhāti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. ^b^Vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti viyūhitvā, apanetvāti attho.

[03]^b^Mahābhūtesū^eb^ti sarīranissitesu mahābhūtesu. ^b^Patatī^eb^ti vicchinditvā patati. Vicchinditvā patitameva hi paṭiggahetabbaṃ, na itaraṃ. ^b^Alladāruṃ rukkhato chinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ettha mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇitumpi vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sappadaṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti asati kappiyakārake sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, aññadā paṭiggahāpetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Appaṭiggahitatā, ananuññātatā, dhūmādiabbohārikābhāvo, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Dantaponasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito bhojanavaggo catuttho.

[03]^b^273^eb^^b^.^eb^ Acelakavaggassa ^a^V3.0068^ea^ paṭhamasikkhāpade ^b^tesa^eb^nti titthiyānaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti bhājane. ^b^Ito^eb^ti pattato. ^b^Sace titthiyo vadatī^eb^ti ‘‘paṭhamameva maṃ sandhāya abhiharitvā ṭhapitaṃ mayhaṃ santakaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ bhājane ākirathā’’ti vadati, vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aññatitthiyatā, ajjhoharaṇīyatā ^a^M3.0076^ea^, ajjhoharaṇatthāya sahatthā anikkhittabhājane dānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Acelakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^274^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva. Anācāraṃ ācaritukāmatā, tadatthameva upasampannassa uyyojanā, evaṃ uyyojentassa upacārātikkamoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Uyyojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^280^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^piṭṭhasaṅghāṭo^eb^ti dvārabāhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Khuddakaṃ nāma sayanigharaṃ vitthārato pañcahatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, tassa ca majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato aḍḍhateyyahatthappamāṇameva hoti, tasmā tādise sayanighare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭato hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisinno piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hoti. Evaṃ nisinno ca majjhaṃ atikkamitvā nisinno nāma hotīti āha ^b^‘‘iminā majjhātikkamaṃ dassetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathā vā tathā vā katassā^eb^ti piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ āropetvā vā anāropetvā vā katassa. ^b^Sacittaka^eb^nti anupavisitvā nisīdanacittena sacittakaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pariyuṭṭhitarāgajāyampatikānaṃ sannihitatā, sayanigharatā, dutiyassa bhikkhuno abhāvo, anupakhajja nisīdananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Sabhojanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^284-289^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthapañcamesu ^a^V3.0069^ea^ natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^298^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0077^ea^^b^pakativacanenā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ dvādasahatthabbhantare ṭhitena sotuṃ sakkā bhaveyya, taṃ pakativacanaṃ nāma. ^b^Āpucchitabbo^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī’’ti vā ‘‘cārittaṃ āpajjāmī’’ti vā īdisena vacanena āpucchitabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantanasādiyanaṃ, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, bhattiyagharato aññagharappavesanaṃ, majjhanhikānatikkamo, samayassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Cārittasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^303^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^mahānāmo nāmā^eb^ti anuruddhattherassa bhātā bhagavato cūḷapitu putto. Suddhodano sakkodano sukkodano dhotodano amitodanoti ime hi pañca janā bhātaro. Amitā nāma devī tesaṃ bhaginī, tissatthero tassā putto. Tathāgato ca nandatthero ca suddhodanassa puttā, mahānāmo ca anuruddhatthero ca sukkodanassa, ānandatthero amitodanassa. So bhagavato kaniṭṭho, mahānāmo mahallakataro sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘mahānāmo nāma…pe… ariyasāvako’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^305-306^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāḷiyaṃ ^b^ajjaṇho^eb^ti ajja ekadivasanti attho, ‘‘ajjano’’ti vā attho gahetabbo, ^b^no^eb^ amhākaṃ. ^b^Kālaṃ āharissathā^eb^ti sve harissatha. ^b^Tato ce uttari sādiyeyyā^eb^ti sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti ‘‘ettakāyeva vā rattiyo ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī’’ti, tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari viññāpento sādiyeyya. ‘‘Imehi tayā bhesajjehi pavāritamha, amhākañca imināva bhesajjena attho’’ti ācikkhitvā viññāpetumpi gilānova labhati.

[03]^b^310^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā saṅghapavāraṇāyamevāyaṃ vidhi, tasmā ^b^‘‘ye attano puggalikāya pavāraṇāya pavāritā’’^eb^ti ^a^V3.0070^ea^ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva. Saṅghapavāraṇatā ^a^M3.0078^ea^, bhesajjaviññatti, agilānatā, pariyantātikkamoti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Mahānāmasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^311^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhamaṃ uttānatthameva. Uyyuttasenā, dassanatthāya gamanaṃ, anuññātokāsato aññatra dassanaṃ, tathārūpapaccayassa āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Uyyuttasenāsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^317^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navamasikkhāpadampi uttānameva. Tirattātikkamo, senāya sūriyassa atthaṅgamo, gilānatādīnaṃ abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Senāvāsasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^322^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^kati te lakkhāni laddhānī^eb^ti tava sarappahārassa lakkhaṇabhūtā kittakā janā tayā laddhāti attho, kittakā tayā viddhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Uyyodhikādidassanatthāya gamanaṃ, anuññātokāsato aññatra dassanaṃ, tathārūpapaccayassa āpadāya vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Uyyodhikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito acelakavaggo pañcamo.

[03]^b^326-328^eb^^b^.^eb^ Surāpānavaggassa ^a^M3.0079^ea^^a^V3.0071^ea^ paṭhamasikkhāpade ^b^vatiyā^eb^ti gāmaparikkhepavatiyā. Pāḷiyaṃ piṭṭhasurādīsu piṭṭhaṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā ^b^piṭṭhasurā^eb^. Evaṃ pūve odane ca bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā ^b^pūvasurā odanasurā^eb^ti ca vuccati. ‘‘Kiṇṇā’’ti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati. Ye surāmodakātipi vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā katā ^b^kiṇṇapakkhittā^eb^. Harītakīsāsapādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā ^b^sambhārasaṃyuttā^eb^.

[03]Madhukatālanāḷikerādipuppharaso ciraparivāsito ^b^pupphāsavo^eb^. Panasādiphalaraso ^b^phalāsavo^eb^. Muddikāraso ^b^madhvāsavo^eb^. Ucchuraso ^b^guḷāsavo^eb^. Harītakāmalakakaṭukabhaṇḍādinānāsambhārānaṃ raso ciraparivāsito ^b^sambhārasaṃyutto. Bījato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti sambhāre paṭiyādetvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhittakālato, tālanāḷikerādīnaṃ puppharasassa gahitaabhinavakālatoyeva ca paṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^329^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Loṇasovīrakaṃ suttañca^eb^ anekehi bhesajjehi abhisaṅkhato amajjabhūto āsavaviseso. ^b^Vāsaggāhāpanattha^eb^nti sugandhibhāvaggāhāpanatthaṃ. ^b^Acittakaṃ lokavajja^eb^nti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Majjabhāvo, tassa pānañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Surāpānasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^330^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^bhikkhunīpi anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitā^eb^ti ettha bhikkhupi bhikkhuniyā anupasampannaṭṭhāne ^a^V3.0072^ea^ ṭhitoti veditabbo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Hasādhippāyatā, upasampannassa kāyena kāyāmasananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Aṅgulipatodakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^335^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyaṃ ^a^M3.0080^ea^ uttānatthameva. Uparigopphakatā, hasādhippāyena kīḷananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Hasadhammasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^344^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^gārayho ācariyuggaho na gahetabbo^eb^ti yasmā ucchuraso sattāhakāliko, tassa kasaṭo yāvajīviko, dvinnaṃyeva samavāyo ucchuyaṭṭhi, tasmā vikāle ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ khādituṃ vaṭṭati guḷaharītakaṃ viyāti evamādiko gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo. ^b^Lokavajje ācariyuggaho na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti lokavajjasikkhāpade āpattiṭṭhāne yo ācariyavādo, so na gahetabbo, lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā ‘‘idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho’’ti vadantassa uggaho na vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Suttānulomaṃ^eb^ nāma aṭṭhakathā. ^b^Paveṇiyā āgatasamodhānaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti ‘‘paveṇiyā āgato ācariyuggahova gahetabbo’’ti evaṃ vutte mahāaṭṭhakathāvādeyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti adhippāyo. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, anādariyakaraṇanti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Anādariyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^345^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamaṃ uttānatthameva. Upasampannatā, tassa dassanasavanavisaye bhiṃsāpetukāmatāya vāyamananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Bhiṃsāpanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^350^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0081^ea^^a^V3.0073^ea^ bhaggā nāma janapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena ‘‘bhaggā’’ti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhaggāti janapadassa nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Susumāragire^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare. Tassa kira nagarassa māpanatthaṃ vatthuvijjācariyena nagaraṭṭhānassa pariggaṇhanadivase avidūre susumāro saddamakāsi giraṃ nicchāresi. Atha anantarāyena nagare māpite tameva susumāragiraṇaṃ subhanimittaṃ katvā susumāragiraṃtvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Keci pana ‘‘susumārasaṇṭhānattā susumāro nāma eko giri, so tassa nagarassa samīpe, tasmā taṃ susumāragiri etassa atthīti ‘susumāragirī’ti vuccatī’’ti vadanti. Tathā vā hotu aññathā vā, nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassāti āha ^b^‘‘susumāragiranti nagarassa nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhesakaḷā^eb^ti ghampaṇḍanāmako gacchaviseso. Keci ‘‘setarukkho’’tipi vadanti. Tesaṃ bahulatāya pana taṃ vanaṃ bhesakaḷāvanantveva paññāyittha. ‘‘Bhesagaḷāvane’’tipi pāṭho. ‘‘Bheso nāma eko yakkho ayuttakārī, tassa tato gaḷitaṭṭhānatāya taṃ vanaṃ bhesagaḷāvanaṃ nāma jāta’’nti hi keci.
[03]^b^352^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jotikaraṇe^eb^ti aggikaraṇe. Sesamettha uttānameva. Agilānatā, anuññātakaraṇābhāvo, visibbetukāmatā, samādahananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Jotisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^357^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattamasikkhāpadassa pāḷiyaṃ ^b^asambhinnenā^eb^ti amakkhitena, anaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyyā^eb^ti nahātadivasato paṭṭhāya addhamāse aparipuṇṇe nahāyeyya. Sesamettha uttānameva. Majjhimadeso, ūnakaddhamāse nahānaṃ, samayānaṃ vā nadīpāragamanassa vā āpadānaṃ vā abhāvoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Nahānasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^368^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0082^ea^^a^V3.0074^ea^^b^‘‘cammakāranīlaṃ^eb^ nāma pakatinīla’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Gaṇṭhipade^eb^ pana ‘‘cammakārā udake tipumalaṃ ayagūthañca pakkhipitvā cammaṃ kāḷaṃ karonti, taṃ cammakāranīla’’nti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Vuttappakārassa cīvarassa akatakappatā, anaṭṭhacīvarāditā, nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Dubbaṇṇakaraṇasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^apaccuddhāraṇa^eb^nti ‘‘mayhaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā’’tiādinā akatapaccuddhāraṃ. ^b^Yena vinayakammaṃ kata^eb^nti yena saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Tiṃsakavaṇṇanāya^eb^nti nissaggiyavaṇṇanāyaṃ. Paribhogena ^b^kāyakammaṃ,^eb^ apaccuddhārāpanena ^b^vacīkammaṃ^eb^. Sesamettha uttānameva. Sāmaṃ vikappitassa apaccuddhāro, vikappanupagacīvaratā, paribhogoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Vikappanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^377^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasamaṃ uttānatthameva. Upasampannassa santakānaṃ pattādīnaṃ apanidhānaṃ, vihesetukāmatā vā hasādhippāyatā vāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Cīvaraapanidhānasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito surāpānavaggo chaṭṭho.

[03]^b^382^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sappāṇakavaggassa ^a^M3.0083^ea^^a^V3.0075^ea^ paṭhamasikkhāpade usuṃ saraṃ assati khipatīti ^b^issāso,^eb^ dhanusippakusaloti āha ^b^‘‘dhanuggahācariyo’’^eb^ti. Paṭisattuvidhamanatthaṃ dhanuṃ gaṇhantīti dhanuggahā, tesaṃ ācariyo ^b^dhanuggahācariyo^eb^. ^b^Appamattena vattaṃ kātabba^eb^nti yathā te pāṇā na maranti, evaṃ sūpaṭṭhitassatinā senāsane vattaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṅgānipi manussaviggahe vuttanayena veditabbānīti.
[06]Sañciccasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^387^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^udakasaṇṭhānakappadese^eb^ti yattha bhūmibhāge udakaṃ nikkhittaṃ santiṭṭhati, na sahasā parikkhayaṃ gacchati, tādise padese. Sesamettha uttānameva. Aṅgāni siñcanasikkhāpade vuttanayāneva.
[06]Sappāṇakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^392^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^yathāpatiṭṭhitabhāvena patiṭṭhātuṃ na dentī^eb^ti tesaṃ pavattiākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana dhammena adhikaraṇaṃ nihataṃ, taṃ sunihatameva. Sace vippakate kamme paṭikkosati, taṃ saññāpetvāva kātabbaṃ. Itarathā kammañca kuppati, kārakānañca āpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Yathādhammaṃ nihatabhāvo, jānanā, ukkoṭanāti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Ukkoṭanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^399^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^M3.0084^ea^^a^V3.0076^ea^^b^tassevā^eb^ti yo āpanno, tasseva. ^b^Ārocetī^eb^ti paṭicchādanatthameva mā kassaci ārocesīti vadati. ^b^Vatthupuggalo^eb^ti āpannapuggalo. ^b^Yenassa ārocita^eb^nti yena dutiyena assa tatiyassa ārocitaṃ. ^b^Koṭi chinnā hotī^eb^ti yasmā paṭicchādanapaccayā āpattiṃ āpajjitvāva dutiyena tatiyassa ārocitaṃ, tasmā tappaccayā puna tena āpajjitabbāpattiyā abhāvato āpattiyā koṭi chinnā nāma hoti.

[03]^b^400^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Anupasampannassa sukkavissaṭṭhi ca kāyasaṃsaggo cāti ayaṃ duṭṭhullaajjhācāro nāmā’’^eb^ti idaṃ duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha (pāci. aṭṭha. 82) ‘‘anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ vā aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti ettha ādito pañca sikkhāpadāni duṭṭhullo nāma ajjhācāro, sesāni aduṭṭhullo, sukkavissaṭṭhikāyasaṃsaggaduṭṭhullaattakāmā panassa ajjhācāro nāmā’’ti. ‘‘Ārocane anupasampannassa duṭṭhullaṃ aññathā adhippetaṃ, paṭicchādane aññathā’’ti etthāpi visesakāraṇaṃ na dissati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāya pubbenāparaṃ na sameti. Avirodhaṃ icchantena pana vīmaṃsitabbamettha kāraṇaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannassa duṭṭhullāpattijānanaṃ, paṭicchādetukāmatāya nārocessāmīti dhuranikkhepoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Duṭṭhullasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^402^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^rūpasutta^eb^nti heraññikānaṃ suttaṃ. ^b^Duruttāna^eb^nti akkosavasena duruttānaṃ, duruttattāyeva ^b^durāgatānaṃ. Vacanapathāna^eb^nti ettha vacanameva tadatthaṃ ñātukāmānaṃ ñāpetukāmānañca pathoti vacanapatho. ^b^Dukkhamāna^eb^nti dukkhena khamitabbānaṃ.

[03]^b^404^eb^^b^.^eb^ Gabbhe ^a^M3.0085^ea^ sayitakālena saddhiṃ vīsatimaṃ vassaṃ assāti ^b^gabbhavīso. Hāyanavaḍḍhana^eb^nti gabbhamāsesu adhikesu uttarihāyanaṃ, ūnesu vaḍḍhananti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Ekūnavīsativassa^eb^nti dvādasamāse mātukucchismiṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya jātakālato paṭṭhāya ekūnavīsativassaṃ. ^b^Pāṭipadadivase^eb^ti pacchimikāya vassūpagamanadivase. ‘‘Tiṃsarattidivo māso’’ti ^a^V3.0077^ea^ (a. ni. 3.71; 8.43; vibha. 1023) vacanato ^b^‘‘cattāro māsā parihāyantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhantī^eb^ti vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhanti, tatiye saṃvacchare ekamāsaṃ adhikamāsavasena pariccajantā vassaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhantīti attho, tasmā tatiyo saṃvaccharo terasamāsiko hoti, saṃvaccharassa pana dvādasamāsikattā aṭṭhārasasu vassesu adhikamāse visuṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘cha māsā vaḍḍhantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ti chamāsato. ^b^Nikkaṅkhā hutvā^eb^ti adhikamāsehi saddhiṃ paripuṇṇavīsativassattā nibbematikā hutvā. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ tīsu ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ ‘‘aṭṭhārasannaṃyeva vassānaṃ adhikamāse gahetvā gaṇitattā sesavassadvayassapi adhikāni divasāni honteva, tāni adhikadivasāni sandhāya ‘nikkaṅkhā hutvā’ti vutta’’nti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi dvīsu vassesu adhikadivasāni nāma visuṃ upalabbhanti tatiye vasse vassukkaḍḍhanavasena adhikamāse pariccatteyeva atirekamāsasambhavato. Tasmā dvīsu vassesu atirekadivasāni nāma visuṃ na sambhavanti.

[03]Nanu ca ‘‘te dve māse gahetvā vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontī’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ, ekūnavīsativassamhi puna aparasmiṃ vasse pakkhitte vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni hontīti āha ^b^‘‘ettha pana…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ ^b^pana^eb^-saddo hi-saddatthe, ettha hīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idañhi vuttassevatthassa samatthanavasena vuttaṃ. Iminā ca imaṃ dīpeti ‘‘yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘ekūnavīsativassaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamanīyapuṇṇamāsiṃ atikkamma pāṭipadadivase upasampādentī’ti, tattha gabbhamāsepi aggahetvā dvīhi māsehi aparipuṇṇavīsativassaṃ sandhāya ‘ekūnavīsativassa’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā adhikamāsesu dvīsu gahitesu vīsativassāni paripuṇṇāni nāma hontī’’ti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā gabbhamāsāpi gaṇanūpagā honti, tasmā. ^b^Ekavīsativasso hotī^eb^ti jātadivasato paṭṭhāya vīsativasso samāno gabbhamāsehi saddhiṃ ekavīsativasso hoti.

[03]^b^406^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññaṃ^eb^^a^M3.0086^ea^^b^upasampādetī^eb^ti upajjhāyo kammavācācariyo vā hutvā upasampādeti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Ūnavīsativassatā, ūnakasaññitā, upasampādananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Ūnavīsativassasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^407^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ ^a^V3.0078^ea^ uttānatthameva. Theyyasatthakabhāvo, jānanaṃ, saṃvidhānaṃ, avisaṅketena gamananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Theyyasatthasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^412^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^417^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^bādhayiṃsū^eb^ti haniṃsu. Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo, diṭṭhadhammikādianattho. Anatikkamanaṭṭhena tasmiṃ antarāye niyuttā, antarāyaṃ vā phalaṃ arahanti, antarāyassa vā karaṇasīlāti ^b^antarāyikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ānantariyadhammā^eb^ti ānantarikasabhāvā cetanādhammā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – cutianantaraphalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttā, taṃnibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlā, anantarappayojanāti vā ānantarikā, te eva ^b^ānantariyā^eb^ti vuttā. Kammāni eva antarāyikāti ^b^kammantarāyikā. Mokkhasseva antarāyaṃ karoti, na saggassā^eb^ti micchācāralakkhaṇābhāvato vuttaṃ. Na hi bhikkhuniyā dhammarakkhitabhāvo atthi. Pākatikabhikkhunīvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ariyāya pana pavattaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikameva, nandamāṇavako cettha nidassanaṃ. Ubhinnaṃ samānacchandatāvasena vā na saggantarāyikatā ^a^M3.0087^ea^, mokkhantarāyikatā pana mokkhatthāya paṭipattiyā vidūsanato. Abhibhavitvā pana pavattiyaṃ saggantarāyikatāpi na sakkā nivāretunti.

[03]Ahetukadiṭṭhiakiriyadiṭṭhinatthikadiṭṭhiyova niyatabhāvaṃ pattā ^b^niyatamicchādiṭṭhidhammā. Paṭisandhidhammā^eb^ti paṭisandhicittuppādamāha. Paṇḍakādiggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ sabbāyapi ahetukapaṭisandhiyā vipākantarāyikabhāvato. Yāhi ariye upavadati, tā cetanā ^b^ariyūpavādā^eb^ jātā. ^b^Tato para^eb^nti khamāpanato upari. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ dibbacakkhukathāyaṃ vuttameva. ^b^Sañcicca āpannā āpattiyo^eb^ti sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā. Sañcicca vītikkantañhi antamaso dukkaṭadubbhāsitampi saggamaggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ ^a^V3.0079^ea^ karoti. ^b^Yāva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānāti^eb^ pārājikaṃ āpanno, ^b^na vuṭṭhāti^eb^ sesagarukāpattiṃ āpanno, ^b^na deseti^eb^ lahukāpattiṃ āpanno.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ bhikkhū^eb^ti ariṭṭho bhikkhu. ^b^Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvā^eb^ti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjakāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ samānetvā.
