Yoniso paccavekkhaṇena natthi ettha chandarāgoti ^b^nicchandarāgo,^eb^ paccayaparibhogo. ^b^Upanento viyā^eb^ti bandhanaṃ upanento viya. ‘‘Ghaṭento viyā’’tipi pāṭho. ^b^Upasaṃharanto viyā^eb^ti sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya ekantasāvajje anavajjabhāvapakkhepanato. ^b^Pāpaka^eb^nti lāmakaṭṭhena duggatisampāpanaṭṭhena ca pāpakaṃ. ^b^Mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena viyā^eb^ti setukaraṇavasena mahāsāgaraṃ bandhantena viya. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇena ‘‘sāvajja’’nti diṭṭhaṃ ‘‘anavajja’’nti gahaṇena tena saha paṭivirujjhanto. ^b^Āṇācakke^eb^ti paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadasaṅkhāte, ‘‘abrahmacariyaṃ pahāyā’’tiādidesanāsaṅkhāte ca āṇācakke.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhikaṅkalaṃ^eb^ nāma uraṭṭhi vā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ vā sīsaṭṭhi vā. Tañhi nimmaṃsattā ‘‘kaṅkala’’nti vuccati. Vigatamaṃsāya hi aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāya ekaṭṭhimhi vā ^b^kaṅkala^eb^-saddo niruḷho. ^b^Anudahanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anupāyapaṭipattiyā sampati āyatiñca anudahanaṭṭhena. ^b^Mahābhitāpanaṭṭhena^eb^ anavaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya, ^b^ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena^eb^^a^M3.0088^ea^ muhuttakaraṇīyatāya, ^b^tāvakālikaṭṭhena^eb^ parehi abhibhavanatāya, ^b^sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena^eb^ bhedanādiadhikaraṇabhāvena, ugghāṭasadisatāya ^b^adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena,^eb^ avaṇe vaṇaṃ uppādetvā anto anupavisanabhāvatāya ^b^vinivijjhanaṭṭhena,^eb^ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaanatthanimittatāya ^b^sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena^eb^.

[03]Pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘thāmasā parāmāsā’’tiādīsu evamattho veditabbo. ^b^Thāmasā^eb^ti diṭṭhithāmena, tassā diṭṭhiyā thāmagatabhāvenāti attho. ^b^Parāmāsā^eb^ti diṭṭhiparāmāsena, diṭṭhisaṅkhātaparāmāsenāti attho. Diṭṭhiyeva hi dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasanena parāmāso. ^b^Abhinivissā^eb^ti taṇhābhinivesapubbaṅgamena diṭṭhābhinivesena ‘‘idamettha sacca’’nti abhinivisitvā. ^b^Voharatī^eb^ti katheti. ^b^Yato ca kho te bhikkhū^eb^ti yadā te bhikkhū. ^b^Evaṃbyākho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā^eb^ti idaṃ esa attano laddhiṃ nigūhitukāmatāya natthīti vattukāmopi bhagavato ānubhāvena sampaṭicchati. Buddhānaṃ kira sammukhā dve kathā kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi. ^b^Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṃ moghapurisā^eb^ti tvaṃ moghapurisa kassa khattiyassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā vessassa vā suddassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā devassa vā manussassa vā mayā evaṃ ^a^V3.0080^ea^ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi. Sesamettha uttānameva. Dhammakammatā, samanubhāsanā, appaṭinissajjananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Ariṭṭhasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^424^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^payogagaṇanāyā^eb^ti dānaggahaṇappayogagaṇanāya. Saṃvāse kammapariyosānavasena, sahaseyyāya ekasmiṃ nipanne itarassa nipajjanapayogavasena āpattiparicchedo veditabbo. Ettha ca padabhājane ‘‘ekacchanne’’ti avisesena vuttattā nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjantassa āpatti. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. ukkhittasambhogasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘saha ^a^M3.0089^ea^ vā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti nānūpacārepi ekacchanne nipajjeyyā’’ti. Paṇṇattiṃ ajānantena arahatāpi kiriyābyākatacittena āpajjitabbattā ^b^‘‘ticitta’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana ^b^kenaci^eb^ vuttaṃ ‘‘ticittanti ettha vipākābyākatacittena saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo, aññathā sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa kiriyābyākataṃ sandhāya na yujjatī’’ti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Na hi sacittakasikkhāpadavītikkamo arahato na sambhavati. Teneva pathavīkhaṇanādīsu sacittakasikkhāpadesu ticittameva vuttaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Akatānudhammatā, jānanā, sambhogādikaraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Ukkhittasambhogasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^428^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^pire^eb^ti nipātapadaṃ. Sambodhane vattamānaṃ para-saddena samānatthaṃ vadantīti āha ^b^‘‘para amāmakā’’^eb^ti, amhākaṃ anajjhattikabhūtāti attho. ^b^Pire^eb^ti vā ‘‘parato’’ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ, tasmā ^b^cara pire^eb^ti parato gaccha, mā idha tiṭṭhāti evampettha attho veditabbo. Sesamettha purimasikkhāpadadvaye vuttanayameva.
[06]Kaṇṭakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Niṭṭhito sappāṇakavaggo sattamo.

[03]^b^434^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sahadhammikavaggassa ^a^V3.0081^ea^ paṭhamasikkhāpade ^b^vācāya vācāya āpattī^eb^ti anādariyabhayā lesena evaṃ vadantassa āpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannassa paññattena vacanaṃ, asikkhitukāmatāya evaṃ vacananti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Sahadhammikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^438^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^a^M3.0090^ea^ vinayassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ ^b^vinayapariyattī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vinayaṃ pariyāpuṇantāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sugutto^eb^ti yathā karaṇḍake pakkhittamaṇikkhandho viya na nassati vipattiṃ na pāpuṇāti, evaṃ suṭṭhu gopito. ^b^Surakkhito^eb^ti tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ. Yathā hi kilesacorehi avilumpanīyo hoti, evaṃ sabbadā sūpaṭṭhitassatitāya suṭṭhu rakkhito. ^b^Kukkuccapakatāna^eb^nti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannakukkuccena abhibhūtānaṃ. Sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato sārado etassāti ^b^visārado. Sahadhammenā^eb^ti sakāraṇena vacanena. ^b^Suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātī^eb^ti yathā na puna sīsaṃ ukkhipanti, atha kho appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtāyeva honti, evaṃ suṭṭhu niggaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Alajjitā^eb^ti ya-kāralopena niddeso, alajjitāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Aññāṇatā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Mando momūho^eb^ti aññāṇabhāvena ^b^mando,^eb^ avisayato ^b^momūho,^eb^ mahāmūḷhoti attho.

[03]^b^Attapaccatthikā^eb^ti attano paccatthikā. ^b^Vajjiputtakā^eb^ dasavatthudīpakā. ^b^Parūpahāraaññāṇakaṅkhāparavitāraṇādivādā^eb^ti ettha ye arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ appatte pattasaññīnaṃ adhimānikānaṃ kuhakānaṃ vā arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā mārakāyikā devatā ‘‘arahato asuciṃ ^a^V3.0082^ea^ upasaṃharantī’’ti maññanti seyyathāpi pubbaseliyā aparaseliyā ca, te ^b^parūpahāravādā^eb^. Yesaṃ pana arahato itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi arahato ^b^aññāṇaṃ,^eb^ tattheva sanniṭṭhānābhāvena atthi arahato ^b^kaṅkhā,^eb^ yasmā cassa tāni vatthūni pare vitārenti pakāsenti ācikkhanti, tasmā atthi arahato ^b^paravitāraṇā^eb^ti imā tisso laddhiyo seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṃ, te aññāṇakaṅkhāparavitāraṇavādā. Niggaho pana nesaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Cattāro maggā ca phalāni cā^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena vuttaṃ, catasso paṭisambhidā tisso vijjā cha abhiññāti ayampi adhigamasaddhammoyeva. ^b^Ca^eb^-kāro ^a^M3.0091^ea^ vā avuttasampiṇḍanattho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Keci therā^eb^ti dhammakathikā. ^b^Āhaṃsū^eb^ti paṃsukūlikattherā evaṃ āhaṃsu.

[03]Kadā panāyaṃ kathā udapādīti? Ayañhettha anupubbikathā (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130) – imasmiṃ kira dīpe caṇḍālatissamahābhaye sakko devarājā mahāuḷumpaṃ māpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi ‘‘mahantaṃ bhayaṃ bhavissati, na sammā devo vassissati, bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā pariyattiṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti, paratīraṃ gantvā ayyehi jīvitaṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati. Imaṃ mahāuḷumpaṃ āruyha gacchatha bhante, yesaṃ ettha nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ nappahoti, te kaṭṭhakhaṇḍepi uraṃ ṭhapetvā gacchantu, sabbesaṃ bhayaṃ na bhavissatī’’ti. Tadā samuddatīraṃ patvā saṭṭhi bhikkhū katikaṃ katvā ‘‘amhākaṃ ettha gamanakiccaṃ natthi, mayaṃ idheva hutvā tepiṭakaṃ rakkhissāmā’’ti tato nivattitvā dakkhiṇamalayajanapadaṃ gantvā kandamūlapaṇṇehi jīvikaṃ kappentā vasiṃsu, kāye vahante nisīditvā sajjhāyaṃ karonti, avahante vālikaṃ ussāretvā parivāretvā sīsāni ekaṭṭhāne katvā pariyattiṃ sammasanti. Iminā niyāmena dvādasa saṃvaccharāni sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dhārayiṃsu.

[03]Bhaye vūpasante sattasatā bhikkhū attano gataṭṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi avināsetvā imameva dīpamāgamma kallagāmajanapade maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ pavisiṃsu. Therānaṃ āgatapavattiṃ sutvā imasmiṃ dīpe ohīnā saṭṭhi bhikkhū ‘‘there passissāmā’’ti gantvā therehi saddhiṃ tepiṭakaṃ sodhentā ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi asamentaṃ nāma na passiṃsu. Tasmiṃ ṭhāne therānaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi ‘‘pariyatti nu kho sāsanassa mūlaṃ, udāhu paṭipattī’’ti. Paṃsukūlikattherā ‘‘paṭipatti mūla’’nti āhaṃsu, dhammakathikā ‘‘pariyattī’’ti ^a^V3.0083^ea^. Atha ne therā ‘‘tumhākaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ vacanamatteneva na sakkā viññātuṃ, jinabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ āharathā’’ti āhaṃsu. Suttaṃ āharituṃ na bhāroti –

[08]‘‘Ime ca, subhadda, bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.214). ‘‘Paṭipattimūlakaṃ, mahārāja, satthusāsanaṃ ^a^M3.0092^ea^, paṭipattisārakaṃ, mahārāja, satthusāsanaṃ, paṭipatti tiṭṭhantī tiṭṭhatī’’ti (mi. pa. 4.1.7) –
[07]Suttaṃ āhariṃsu.
[03]Imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā dhammakathikā attano vādaṭṭhapanatthāya imaṃ suttaṃ āhariṃsu –
[21]‘‘Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
[22]Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
[21]‘‘Suttantesu asantesu, pamuṭṭhe vinayamhi ca;
[22]Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
[21]‘‘Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
[22]Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī’’ti.

[03]Imasmiṃ sutte āhaṭe paṃsukūlikattherā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Dhammakathikattherānaṃyeva vacanaṃ purato ahosi. Yathā hi gavasatassa gavasahassassa vā antare paveṇipālikāya dhenuyā asati so vaṃso sā paveṇī na ghaṭīyati, evameva āraddhavipassakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi vijjamāne pariyattiyā asati ariyamaggapaṭivedho nāma na hoti. Yathā ca nidhikumbhiyā jānanatthāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe akkharesu upanibaddhesu yāva akkharāni dharanti, tāva nidhikumbhī naṭṭhā nāma na hoti, evameva pariyattiyā dharamānāya sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma na hotīti. ^b^Tassādheyyo^eb^ti tassāyatto.
[03]^b^439^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^So^eb^^a^V3.0084^ea^^b^panā^eb^ti so pātimokkho. Sesamettha uttānameva. Garahitukāmatā, upasampannassa santike sikkhāpadavivaṇṇanañcāti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Vilekhanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^443^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyaṃ ^a^M3.0093^ea^ uttānameva. Mohāropanaṃ, mohetukāmatā, vuttanayena sutabhāvo, mohananti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Mohanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^452^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^rattacitto^eb^ti kāyasaṃsaggarāgena rattacitto. Sace pana methunarāgena ratto pahāraṃ deti, dukkaṭameva. Sesamettha uttānameva. Kupitatā, na mokkhādhippāyatā, upasampannassa pahāradānanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Pahārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^457^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā dukkaṭa^eb^nti ettha paharitukāmatāya pahaṭe purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ, uccāretukāmatāya kevalaṃ uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ. Iminā pana virajjhitvā pahāro dinno, tasmā dukkaṭaṃ. Kimidaṃ dukkaṭaṃ pahārapaccayā, udāhu uggiraṇapaccayāti? Tattha keci tāva vadanti ‘‘pahārapaccayā eva dukkaṭaṃ, uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyanti sadukkaṭaṃ pācittiyaṃ yujjati. Purimañhi uggiraṇaṃ, pacchā pahāro, na ca pacchā pahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ bhavitumarahatī’’ti.

[03]Mayaṃ ^a^V3.0085^ea^ panettha evaṃ takkayāma ‘‘uggiraṇassa attano sabhāveneva asaṇṭhitattā tappaccayā pācittiyena na bhavitabbaṃ, asuddhacittena katapayogattā pana na sakkā ettha anāpattiyā bhavitunti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ. ‘Na paharitukāmatāya dinnattā’ti iminā ca pahārapaccayā purimasikkhāpadena pācittiyāsambhave kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, na pana pahārapaccayā dukkaṭasambhave. Na hi apaharitukāmatāya pahāre dinne ^a^M3.0094^ea^ purimasikkhāpadena pahārapaccayā pācittiyena dukkaṭena vā bhavituṃ yutta’’nti. ‘‘Tiracchānādīnaṃ asucikaraṇādiṃ disvā kujjhitvāpi uggirantassa mokkhādhippāyo evā’’ti vadanti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Kupitatā, na mokkhādhippāyatā, upasampannassa talasattiuggiraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Talasattikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^459^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānatthameva. Upasampannatā, saṅghādisesassa amūlakatā, anuddhaṃsanā, taṅkhaṇavijānanāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Amūlakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^464^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattamampi uttānatthameva. Upasampannatā, aphāsukāmatā, kukkuccuppādananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Sañciccasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^471^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^sutisamīpa^eb^nti saddasamīpaṃ. Suyyatīti hi suti, saddassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tassa samīpaṃ ^b^upassuti,^eb^ saddasamīpanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ ca suyyatīti sutīti saddova vutto. Yattha pana ṭhitena sakkā hoti saddaṃ sotuṃ, tattha tiṭṭhanto saddasamīpe ṭhito nāma hotīti ^a^V3.0086^ea^ āha ^b^‘‘yattha ṭhatvā’’^eb^tiādi. Keci pana ‘‘suṇāti etthāti suti. Yattha ṭhito suṇāti, tassa ṭhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassa samīpaṃ upassutī’’ti vadanti, evaṃ pana gayhamāne yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito suṇāti, tassa ^a^M3.0095^ea^ āsanne aññasmiṃ padese tiṭṭhatīti āpajjati. Aṭṭhakathāyañca ^b^upassuti^eb^-saddasseva atthaṃ dassetuṃ ‘‘yattha ṭhatvā sakkā hoti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotu’’nti vuttaṃ, na ^b^suti^eb^-saddassa. Tasmā pubbanayovettha pasatthataro. Atha vā upecca suyyati etthāti ^b^upassuti,^eb^ ṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti kathentānaṃ saddaṃ sotuṃ, tatthāti evamattho gahetabbo. ^b^Mantenta^eb^nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘mantayamāne’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^473^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaparicchedānī^eb^ti ‘‘siyā kiriyaṃ, siyā akiriya’’nti iminā nayena ekaparicchedāni. Imāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni kadāci kiriyato samuṭṭhahanti, kadāci akiriyato, na ekakkhaṇeyeva kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhahanti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Upasampannatā, codanādhippāyo, savananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Upassutisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^474^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navamaṃ uttānatthameva. Dhammakammatā, dhammakammanti saññā, chandaṃ datvā khiyyananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Kammapaṭibāhanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^479^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasamaṃ uttānatthameva. Vinicchayakathāya pavattamānatā, dhammakammatā, dhammakammasaññitā, samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitatā, samānasaṃvāsakatā, kopetukāmatāya hatthapāsavijahananti imāni panettha cha aṅgāni.
[06]Chandaṃ adatvā gamanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^484^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasamampi ^a^M3.0096^ea^^a^V3.0087^ea^ uttānatthameva. Upasampannatā, dhammena laddhasammutitā, saṅghena saddhiṃ vikappanupagacīvaradānaṃ, pacchā khīyitukāmatāya khiyyanāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Dubbalasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^489^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dvādasame natthi kiñci vattabbaṃ.
[06]Niṭṭhito sahadhammikavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03]^b^497-499^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rājavaggassa paṭhamasikkhāpade aṭṭhakathāyaṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ayamanuttānapadattho. ^b^Kataṃ vā karissanti vā^eb^ti methunavītikkamanaṃ kataṃ vā karissanti vā. ^b^Imesa^eb^nti padaṃ vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ ‘‘imehi kataṃ ime karissantī’’ti. ^b^Ratana^eb^nti maṇiratanādīsu yaṃkiñci. ^b^Ubhato^eb^ti dvīhi pakkhehi. ‘‘Ubhato sujāto’’ti ettake vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātatā viññāyeyya, ^b^sujāta^eb^-saddo ca ‘‘sujāto cārudassano’’tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyoti jātivaseneva sujātataṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘mātito ca pitito cā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Anorasaputtavasenapi loke mātupitusamaññā dissati, idha pana sā orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘saṃsuddhagahaṇiko’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti dhāretīti gahaṇī, gabbhāsayasaññito mātukucchippadeso. Saṃsuddhā gahaṇī assāti ^b^saṃsuddhagahaṇiko,^eb^ saṃsuddhā tassa mātukucchīti vuttaṃ hoti. ‘‘Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā’’ti ^a^V3.0088^ea^ ettha pana yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipācanavasena gaṇhanato achaḍḍanato kammajatejodhātu ‘‘gahaṇī’’ti vuccati.

[03]^b^Yāva^eb^^a^M3.0097^ea^^b^sattamā pitāmahayugā^eb^ti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho, pitāmahassa yugaṃ pitāmahayugaṃ. ‘‘Yuga’’nti āyuppamāṇaṃ vuccati. Abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugaṃ. Pitā ca mātā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā, tesaṃ yugo pitāmahayugo, tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā, pitāmahadvandāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Evañhi pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahito hoti. ^b^Yuga^eb^-saddo cettha ekasesena daṭṭhabbo yugo ca yugo ca yugoti. Evañhi tattha tattha dvandaṃ gahitameva hoti, tasmā tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahayugaggahaṇeneva gahitā. Evaṃ yāva sattamo pitāmahayugo, tāva saṃsuddhagahaṇiko.

[03]^b^Akkhitto^eb^ti ‘‘apanetha etaṃ, kiṃ iminā’’ti evaṃ akkhitto anavakkhitto. ^b^Anupakuṭṭho^eb^ti na upakuṭṭho, na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo. Kena kāraṇenāti āha ^b^‘‘jātivādenā’’^eb^ti. Ettha ca ‘‘ubhato…pe… pitāmahayugā’’ti etena tassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato, ‘‘akkhitto’’ti iminā kiriyāparādhābhāvo. Kiriyāparādhena hi sattā khepaṃ pāpuṇanti. ‘‘Anupakuṭṭho’’ti iminā ayuttasaṃsaggābhāvo. Ayuttasaṃsaggañhi paṭicca sattā akkosaṃ labhanti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Khattiyatā, abhisittatā, ubhinnampi sayanigharato anikkhantatā, appaṭisaṃviditatā, indakhīlātikkamoti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.
[06]Antepurasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^502^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^mahālataṃ nāmā^eb^ti patikulaṃ gacchantiyā kira tassā pitā mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ nāma kārāpesi. Tasmiṃ piḷandhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo tattha tattha appetabbaṭṭhāne appanavasena viniyogaṃ agamaṃsu, muttānaṃ ekādasa nāḷiyo, pavāḷassa dvāvīsati nāḷiyo, maṇīnaṃ tettiṃsa nāḷiyo. Iti etehi ca aññehi ca veḷuriyalohitaṅkamasāragallādīhi sattavaṇṇehi ca ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi ^a^M3.0098^ea^. Taṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ ^a^V3.0089^ea^ yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā bhassati, pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārayamānāva itthī naṃ dhāretuṃ sakkoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^506^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āvasathassa pana suppapāto vā musalapāto vā upacāro nāmāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Āvasatho^eb^ti cettha antoārāme vā hotu aññattha vā, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vuccati. ^b^Chandenapi bhayenapī^eb^ti vaḍḍhakīādīsu chandena, rājavallabhesu bhayena. ^b^Tameva bhikkhuṃ āsaṅkantī^eb^ti vissaritvā gamanakāle attano pacchato aññassābhāvā āsaṅkanti. ^b^Patirūpaṃ^eb^ nāma ratanasammate paṃsukūlaggahaṇaṃ vā ratane nirussukkagamanaṃ vā. Yadi hi taṃ ratanasammataṃ āmāsaṃ ce, ‘‘natthi etassa sāmī’’ti paṃsukūlaṃ gahessati. Anāmāsaṃ ce, ‘‘natthi etassa sāmī’’ti paṃsukūlachinnapalibodho nirapekkho gamissati. ^b^Samādapetvā^eb^ti aññaṃ samādapetvā, ‘‘uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyānayācanā’’ti (jā. 1.7.59) vuttanayena yācitvāti attho. Sesamettha uttānameva. Ananuññātakaraṇaṃ, parasantakatā, vissāsaggāhapaṃsukūlasaññānaṃ abhāvo, uggahaṇaṃ vā uggahāpanaṃ vāti imāni panettha cattāri aṅgāni.
[06]Ratanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^ariyamaggassā^eb^ti ettha saggamaggopi saṅgahetabbo. Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā hi kathā ^b^tiracchānakathā. Tiracchānabhūta^eb^nti tirokaraṇabhūtaṃ vibandhanabhūtaṃ. ^b^Rājapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ katha^eb^nti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.17; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.223; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.1080; a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.10.69-70) rājānaṃ ārabbha ‘‘mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃmahānubhāvo’’tiādinā nayena pavattakathaṃ. Ettha ca ‘‘asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo’’tiādinā nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti. ‘‘Sopi nāma evaṃmahānubhāvo khayaṃ gato’’ti evaṃ pavattā pana aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttā kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati. ^b^Coresupi^eb^ ‘‘mūladevo evaṃmahānubhāvo, meghamālo evaṃmahānubhāvo’’ti ^a^M3.0099^ea^ tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca ‘‘aho sūrā’’ti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā. ^b^Yuddhepi^eb^ bharatayuddhādīsu ‘‘asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho’’ti kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā. ‘‘Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā’’ti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.

[03]Apica ^a^V3.0090^ea^^b^annā^eb^dīsu ‘‘evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā’’ti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā ‘‘pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālāgandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha, cetiyapūjaṃ akarimhā’’ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Ñātikathā^eb^dīsupi ‘‘amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā’’ti vā ‘‘pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā’’ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā ‘‘tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā’’ti vā ‘‘pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā’’ti vā kathetabbaṃ. ^b^Gāmakathāpi^eb^ suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā ‘‘asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā’’ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā ‘‘saddhā pasannā’’ti vā ‘‘khayavayaṃ gatā’’ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Itthikathāpi^eb^ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati, ‘‘saddhā pasannā, khayaṃ gatā’’ti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Sūrakathāpi^eb^ ‘‘nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī’’ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, ‘‘saddho ahosi, khayaṃ gato’’ti evameva vaṭṭati. ^b^Visikhākathāpi^eb^ ‘‘asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā’’ti assādavaseneva na vaṭṭati, ‘‘saddhā pasannā, khayaṃ gatā’’icceva vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Kumbhaṭṭhānakathā^eb^ti kuṭaṭṭhānakathā udakatitthakathā vuccati, kumbhadāsīkathā vā. Sāpi ‘‘pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā’’ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, ‘‘saddhā pasannā’’tiādinā nayeneva vaṭṭati. ^b^Pubbapetakathā^eb^ti atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo.

[03]^b^Nānattakathā^eb^ti purimapacchimakathāvimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā. ^b^Lokakkhāyikā^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ loko kena nimmito, asukena ^a^M3.0100^ea^ pajāpatinā brahmunā issarena vā nimmito, kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā, bakā rattā lohitassa rattattā’’ti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā. Uppattiṭhitisaṃhārādivasena lokaṃ akkhāyatīti ^b^lokakkhāyikā^eb^. ^b^Samuddakkhāyikā^eb^ nāma kasmā samuddo sāgaro, sāgarassa rañño puttehi khatattā sāgaro. Khato amhehīti hatthamuddāya niveditattā samuddoti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyikakathā.

[03]Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā ^b^itibhavābhavakathā^eb^. Ettha ca ^b^bhavo^eb^ti sassataṃ, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti ucchedaṃ. ^b^Bhavo^eb^ti vuddhi, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti hāni ^a^V3.0091^ea^. ^b^Bhavo^eb^ti kāmasukhaṃ, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti attakilamatho. Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma hoti. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā ^b^iti^eb^-saddena saṅgahetvā chattiṃsa tiracchānakathāti vuccati. ^b^Iti vā^eb^ti hi ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakāratthe, ^b^vā^eb^-saddo vikappatthe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ‘‘evaṃpakāraṃ ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ niratthakakathaṃ kathentī’’ti. Ādiatthe vā ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ‘‘iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.10, 194) viya, evamādiṃ aññampi tādisaṃ kathaṃ kathentīti attho.

[03]^b^512^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo^eb^ti iminā dutiyaleḍḍupāto idha upacāroti dasseti. Sesamettha uttānameva. Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchanā, anuññātakāraṇābhāvo, vikāle gāmappavisananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Vikālagāmappavisanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^517^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^taṃ assa atthī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ bhinditvā pacchā desetabbattā taṃ bhedanakaṃ tassa pācittiyassa atthīti ^b^bhedanakaṃ,^eb^ pācittiyaṃ. Assatthiatthe ^a^M3.0101^ea^ a-kārapaccayo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vāsijaṭe^eb^ti vāsidaṇḍake. Sesamettha uttānameva. Sūcigharatā, aṭṭhimayāditā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
[06]Sūcigharasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^522^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^chedanakaṃ vuttanayamevā^eb^ti chedanameva chedanakaṃ, taṃ tassa atthīti ^b^chedanaka^eb^nti imamatthaṃ atidissati. Sesamettha uttānameva. Pamāṇātikkantamañcapīṭhatā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Mañcapīṭhasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^526^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^V3.0092^ea^^b^tūlaṃ pakkhipitvā^eb^ti heṭṭhā cimilikaṃ pattharitvā tassa upari tūlaṃ pakkhipitvāti attho. ^b^Poṭakitūla^eb^nti erakatūlādi yaṃkiñci tiṇajātīnaṃ tūlaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Tūlonaddhamañcapīṭhatā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni. Attanā kārāpitassa hi paṭilābhamatteneva pācittiyaṃ. Teneva padabhājane ‘‘paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabba’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Kenaci^eb^ pana ‘‘paṭilābhena uddāletvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbanti ettha kiñcāpi paṭilābhamatteneva pācittiyaṃ viya dissati, paribhogeyeva āpatti daṭṭhabbā. ‘Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā’ti vacanaṃ ettha sādhaka’’nti vuttaṃ, taṃ tassa matimattaṃ. Na hi ‘‘aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti idaṃ attanā kārāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, karaṇakārāpanapaccayā ca iminā sikkhāpadena pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, na paribhogapaccayā. ‘‘Na, bhikkhave, tūlonaddhaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā paribhuñjitabbaṃ, yo paribhuñjeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti hi khandhake ^a^M3.0102^ea^ vuttattā attanā vā kataṃ hotu aññena vā, paribhuñjantassa paribhogapaccayā dukkaṭameva, na pācittiyaṃ.
[06]Tūlonaddhasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^531^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpade vuttameva. Nisīdanassa pamāṇātikkantatā, attano atthāya karaṇaṃ vā kārāpetvā vā paṭilābhoti imāni panettha dve aṅgāni.
[06]Nisīdanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^537-542^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhamanavamadasamesu ^a^V3.0093^ea^ natthi vattabbaṃ, aṅgānipi sattameva vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
[06]Niṭṭhito rājavaggo navamo.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Khuddakavaṇṇanā samattā.
[06]Pācittiyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^552^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pāṭidesanīyesu ^a^M3.0103^ea^^a^V3.0094^ea^ paṭhame ^b^‘‘gārayhaṃ āvusotiādi paṭidesetabbākāradassana’’^eb^nti vacanato pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayeneva āpatti desetabbā. ^b^Asappāya^eb^nti saggamokkhānaṃ ahitaṃ ananukūlaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva. Paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, aññātikatā, antaraghare ṭhitāya hatthato sahatthā paṭiggahaṇaṃ, yāvakālikatā, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni panettha pañca aṅgāni.

[03]^b^557-562^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyatatiyacatutthesu natthi vattabbaṃ, aṅgesu pana dutiye paripuṇṇūpasampannatā, pañcabhojanatā, antaraghare ṭhitāya anuññātappakārato aññathā vosāsanā, anivāraṇā, ajjhohāroti imāni pañca aṅgāni.
[03]Tatiye sekkhasammatatā, pubbe animantitatā, agilānatā, gharūpacārokkamanaṃ, ṭhapetvā niccabhattādīni aññaṃ āmisaṃ gahetvā bhuñjananti imāni pañca aṅgāni.
[03]Catutthe yathāvuttaāraññakasenāsanatā, yāvakālikassa atatthajātakatā, agilānatā, agilānāvasesakatā, appaṭisaṃviditatā, ajjhārāme paṭiggahaṇaṃ, ajjhoharaṇanti imāni satta aṅgāni.
[06]Pāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Pāṭidesanīyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]Sekhiyesu ^a^M3.0104^ea^^a^V3.0095^ea^^b^sikkhitasikkhenā^eb^ti catūhi maggehi tisso sikkhā sikkhitvā ṭhitena, sabbaso pariniṭṭhitakiccenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tādinā^eb^ti aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyaṭṭhena tādinā.

[03]^b^576^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sikkhā karaṇīyā^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ nivāsessāmī’’ti ārāmepi antaragharepi sabbattha sikkhā kattabbā. Ettha ca yasmā vattakkhandhake vuttavattānipi sikkhitabbattā sekhiyāneva honti, tasmā pārājikādīsu viya paricchedo na kato, cārittanayadassanatthañca ‘‘yo pana bhikkhu olambento nivāseyya, dukkaṭa’’nti evaṃ āpattināmena avatvā ‘‘sikkhā karaṇīyā’’ti evaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu pāḷi āropitā. Padabhājane pana ‘‘āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti vuttattā sabbattha anādariyakaraṇe dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^Vutta^eb^nti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṃ otāretvā nivatthameva nisinnassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ hoti, tasmā ubhopete aṭṭhakathāvādā ekaparicchedā. ^b^Te sabbe^eb^ti nivāsanadosā.

[03]^b^Taṃ panā^eb^ti taṃ anādariyaṃ. Kiñcāpi kurundivādaṃ pacchā vadantena ‘‘parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpattī’’ti ayamattho patiṭṭhāpito, tathāpi nivāsanavattaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbameva. Sañcicca anuggaṇhantassa anādariyaṃ siyā. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. parimaṇḍalasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘ajānantassāti parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetuṃ ajānantassa anāpatti, apica nivāsanavattaṃ uggahetabba’’nti.

[03]^b^Sacittaka^eb^nti vatthuvijānanacittena paṇṇattivijānanacittena ca sacittakaṃ ‘‘anādariyaṃ paṭiccā’’ti vuttattā. ‘‘Pāṇātipātādi viya nivāsanadoso lokagarahito na hotīti paṇṇattivajja’’nti ^a^V3.0096^ea^^b^phussadevatthero^eb^ āha. ^b^Upatissatthero^eb^ pana ‘‘yasmā anādariyavaseneva āpajjitabbattā kevalaṃ akusalameva, tañca pakatiyā vajjaṃ, sañcicca vītikkamanañca ^a^M3.0105^ea^ domanassitasseva hoti, tasmā lokavajjaṃ akusalacittaṃ dukkhavedana’’nti āha. Anādariyaṃ, anāpattikāraṇābhāvo, aparimaṇḍalanivāsananti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbattha purimāni dve tattha tattha vuttapaṭipakkhakaraṇañcāti tīṇiyeva honti.

[03]^b^577^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyādīsu ^b^anekappakāraṃ gihipāruta^eb^nti setapaṭapārutaṃ paribbājakapārutaṃ ekasāṭakapārutantiādi anekappabhedaṃ gihipārutaṃ. Tassattho khandhakeyeva āvi bhavissati. ^b^Vihārepī^eb^ti buddhupaṭṭhānādikālaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^578^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Suppaṭicchanno’’ti vuttattā ‘‘sasīsaṃ pāruto sabbathā suppaṭicchannattā suppaṭicchanno nāma hotī’’ti yassa siyā, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘na sasīsaṃ pārutenā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^582^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyeva, tathā gāme pūja’’nti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.
[06]Parimaṇḍalavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^586^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyavagge ^b^hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmi^eb^nti hāsajanake kāraṇe.
[06]Ujjagghikavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^603^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyavagge patte saññā pattasaññā, sā assa atthīti ^b^pattasaññī,^eb^ attano bhājane upanibandhasaññī hutvāti attho. Byañjanaṃ pana anādiyitvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘patte saññaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^604^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Oloṇī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0097^ea^ ekā byañjanavikati. ‘‘Yo koci suddho kañjikatakkādirasao’’ti keci. ^b^Sākasūpeyya^eb^-ggahaṇena yā kāci sūpeyyasākehi ^a^M3.0106^ea^ katā byañjanavikati vuttā. ^b^Maṃsarasādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena avasesā sabbāpi byañjanavikati saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva ^b^mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. samasūpakapaṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ ‘‘ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṃ avasesā sabbāpi sūpeyyā byañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hotī’’ti.

[03]^b^605^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samapuṇṇa^eb^nti adhiṭṭhānupagassa pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṃ anatikkāmetvā racitaṃ. ^b^Samabharita^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Phalāphalādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena odanādimpi saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Heṭṭhā orohatī^eb^ti samantā okāsasabbhāvato cāliyamānaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati. Matthake thūpīkataṃ pūvameva vaṭaṃsakasadisattā ^b^‘‘pūvavaṭaṃsaka’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pupphavaṭaṃsakā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]Yasmā ‘‘samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo’’ti vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto sampuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti dīpeti, tasmā attano hatthagate patte piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti, vaṭṭatīti dīpeti. ‘‘Thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassā’’ti hi vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pacchā paṭiggaṇhato āpattīti dīpeti. ‘‘Patte paṭiggaṇhato ca thūpīkataṃ hoti, vaṭṭati athūpīkatassa paṭiggahitattā, payogo pana natthi aññatra pubbadesā’’ti ^b^kenaci^eb^ vuttaṃ, taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ. ‘‘Na thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ thūpīkatasseva pacchā paṭiggaṇhanaṃ dīpeti. Na hi hatthagatepi patte diyyamānaṃ thūpīkataṃ gaṇhanto thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto nāma na hoti, na ca tena samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahitoti sakkā viññātuṃ. ‘‘Thūpīkata’’nti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddese gayhamāne ayamattho suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭoyevāti.
[06]Khambhakatavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^608^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthavagge ^b^sapadāna^eb^nti ettha dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ, apetaṃ dānato apadānaṃ, anavakhaṇḍananti attho. Saha apadānena sapadānaṃ, avakhaṇḍanavirahitaṃ ^a^M3.0107^ea^, anupaṭipāṭiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tattha tattha odhiṃ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^611^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmiṃ ^a^V3.0098^ea^ samaye ‘‘pāṇo na hantabbo’’ti rājāno bheriṃ carāpenti, ayaṃ ^b^māghātasamayo^eb^ nāma. Idha anāpattiyaṃ gilāno na āgato, tasmā gilānassapi āpatti. Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpade ^b^asañcicca assatiyā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘mukhe pakkhipitvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā chaḍḍentassa aruciyā pavisante ‘asañciccā’ti vuccati, viññattimpi aviññattimpi etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā gahetvā bhuñjante ‘assatiyā’ti vuccatī’’ti tīsupi ^b^gaṇṭhipadesu^eb^ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^614-615^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ujjhāne saññā ujjhānasaññā, sā assa atthīti ^b^ujjhānasaññī^eb^. ‘‘Mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahanta’’nti vacanato mayūraṇḍappamāṇo kabaḷo na vaṭṭati. Keci pana ‘‘mayūraṇḍato mahanto na vaṭṭatī’’ti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ, ‘‘nātimahanta’’nti ca atimahantasseva paṭikkhittattā khuddake āpatti na dissati. ‘‘Mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahantaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakaṃ, tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇo’’ti iminā pana sāruppavasena khuddakampi paṭikkhipitvā paricchedo na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
[06]Sakkaccavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^618^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamavagge ^b^sabbaṃ hattha^eb^nti ettha ^b^hattha^eb^-saddo tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo ‘‘hatthamuddā’’tiādīsu viya, samudāye pavattavohārassa avayavepi vattanato ekaṅgulimpi mukhe pakkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati.
[06]Kabaḷavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^627^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhavagge ^b^sītīkato^eb^ti sītaṭṭo, sītapīḷitoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Silakabuddho^eb^ti parihāsavacanametaṃ. Silakañhi kañci disvā ‘‘buddho aya’’nti voharanti.

[03]^b^634^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vilīvacchatta^eb^nti ^a^M3.0108^ea^ veṇuvilīvehi kataṃ chattaṃ. ^b^Tatthajātakadaṇḍakena kata^eb^nti tālapaṇṇaṃ saha daṇḍakena chinditvā tameva chattadaṇḍaṃ karonti gopālakādayo viya, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ ^a^V3.0099^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Chattapādukāya vā ṭhitaṃ hotī^eb^ti ettha chattapādukā vuccati chattādhāro. Yasmiṃ chattaṃ apatamānaṃ katvā ṭhapenti, tādisikāya chattapādukāya ṭhitaṃ chattaṃ ‘‘chatta’’nti ajjhāharitabbaṃ. ‘‘Chattaṃ chattapādukāya ṭhita’’ntipi paṭhanti, tatthāpi ayamevattho.
[03]^b^637^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cāpo^eb^ti majjhe vaṅkā kācadaṇḍasadisā dhanuvikati. ^b^Kodaṇḍo^eb^ti vaṭṭaladaṇḍā dhanuvikati. ^b^Paṭimukka^eb^nti pavesitaṃ laggitaṃ.
[06]Surusuruvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^647^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattamavagge ^b^paṭicchanno hutvā^eb^ti so kira rattibhāge uyyānaṃ gantvā ambaṃ abhiruhitvā sākhāya sākhaṃ ambaṃ olokento vicari. Tassa tathā karontasseva ratti vibhāyi. So cintesi ‘‘sace idāni otaritvā gamissāmi, disvā maṃ coroti gahessanti, rattibhāge gamissāmī’’ti. Athekaṃ viṭapaṃ abhiruhitvā nilīno acchi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. So rukkhato otaranto ekaṃ olambinisākhaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ ubhinnampi antare patiṭṭhāsi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ dvinnampi antarā rukkhato patito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pāḷiyā atthaṃ na jānantī^eb^ti attano gahaṇassa atthaṃ na jānanti.
[03]^b^Jātakapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (jā. 1.4.33) pana ayaṃ gāthā –
[21]‘‘Sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ kataṃ, ubho dhammaṃ na passare;
[27]Ubho pakatiyā cutā, yo cāyaṃ mantejjhāpeti;
[22]Yo ca mantaṃ adhīyatī’’ti. –

[07]Evamāgatā. Tassāyamattho (jā. aṭṭha. 3.4.33) – ^b^sabbamidaṃ carimaṃ kata^eb^nti yaṃ amhehi tīhi janehi kataṃ, sabbamidaṃ kiccaṃ lāmakaṃ nimmariyādaṃ adhammikaṃ. Evaṃ attano ^a^M3.0109^ea^ corabhāvaṃ tesañca mantesu agāravaṃ garahitvā puna itare dveyeva garahanto ^b^‘‘ubho dhammaṃ na passare’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^ubho^eb^ti ime dvepi janā garukārārahaṃ porāṇakadhammaṃ na passanti, tatova dhammapakatito cutā. Dhammo hi paṭhamuppattivasena ^b^pakati^eb^ nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Dhammo ^a^V3.0100^ea^ have pāturahosi pubbe,
[22]Pacchā adhammo udapādi loke’’ti. (jā. 1.11.28);
[07]^b^Yo cāya^eb^nti yo ca ayaṃ nīce nisīditvā mante ajjhāpeti, yo ca ucce nisīditvā adhīyatīti.
[03]^b^Sālīna^eb^nti ayaṃ gāthāpi –
[21]‘‘Sālīnaṃ odanaṃ bhuñje, suciṃ maṃsūpasecanaṃ;
[22]Tasmā etaṃ na sevāmi, dhammaṃ isīhi sevita’’nti. (jā. 1.4.34) –
[07]Evaṃ jātake āgatā. Tattha ^b^suci^eb^nti paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ. ^b^Maṃsūpasecana^eb^nti nānappakārāya maṃsavikatiyā sittaṃ bhuñje, bhuñjāmīti attho. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03]^b^Dhiratthū^eb^ti dhi atthu, nindā bhavatūti attho, garahāma taṃ mayanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Laddhalābho^eb^ti dhanalābhaṃ yasalābhañca sandhāya vadati. ^b^Vinipātanahetunā^eb^ti vinipātanassa hetubhāvena. ^b^Vutti nāma hotī^eb^ti yathāvutto duvidhopi lābho apāyasaṃvattanikatāya samparāye vinipātanahetubhāvena pavattanato sampati adhammacaraṇena pavattanato ca vutti nāma hotīti attho. ^b^Evarūpā yā vuttī^eb^ti evarūpā dhanalābhayasalābhasaṅkhātā yā vutti. ^b^Adhammacaraṇena vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. ^b^Tva^eb^nti upayogatthe paccattavacanaṃ, taṃ icceva vā pāṭho. ^b^Asmā^eb^ti pāsāṇādhivacanametaṃ.
[06]Pādukavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Sekhiyakaṇḍaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[03]Adhikaraṇasamathesu ^a^M3.0110^ea^^a^V3.0101^ea^ yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
[06]Iti samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpaniyaṃ
[06]Bhikkhuvibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Mahāvibhaṅgo niṭṭhito.
[06] Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
